anya-e0703n0:17_0: Dīpaṅkarañhi sambuddhaṃ, passitvā no jino purā;
anya-e0703n0:18_0: Lokaṃ dukkhā pamocetuṃ, bodhāya paṇidhiṃ akā.
anya-e0703n0:20_0: Tato tañceva sambuddhaṃ, koṇḍaññaṃ maṅgalaṃ muniṃ;
anya-e0703n0:36_0: Uttamo gotamo buddho, satte dukkhā pamocayi.
anya-e0703n0:41_0: Sattāhāni tahiṃ satta, so vimuttisukhaṃ paraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:45_0: Tattha vassa vasanto’va, saṭṭhiṃ arahataṃ akā.
anya-e0703n0:48_0: Vinetvā ca tato tiṃsa-sahā ye bhaddavaggiye.
anya-e0703n0:62_0: Sāsanujjotanaṃ ṭhānaṃ, laṃkā ñātā jinena hi;
anya-e0703n0:63_0: Yakkhapuṇṇāya laṅkāya, yakkhā nibbā siyāti ca.
anya-e0703n0:77_0: Te bhayaṭṭhā’bhayaṃ yakkhā, ayācuṃ abhayaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:78_0: Jino abhayado āha, yakkhe te’ti bhayaddīte.
anya-e0703n0:80_0: Yakkhā bhayaṃ vo dukkhañca, harissāmi idaṃ ahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:81_0: Tumhe nisajjaṭhānaṃ me, samaggā detha no idha.
anya-e0703n0:83_0: Āhu te sugataṃ yakkhā, dema mārisa te idha;
anya-e0703n0:84_0: Sabbepi sakalaṃ dīpaṃ, dehi no abhayaṃ tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:86_0: Bhayaṃ sītaṃ tamaṃ tesaṃ, hantvā taṃ dinnabhūmiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:87_0: Cammakkhandhaṃ attharitvā, tatthā’ sīno jino tato.
anya-e0703n0:90_0: Ghammābhibhūtā te bhītā, ṭhitā ante samantato.
anya-e0703n0:92_0: Giridīpaṃ tato nātho, rammaṃ tesaṃ idhā’nayi;
anya-e0703n0:93_0: Tesu tattha paviṭṭhesu, yathāṭhāne ṭhapesi ca.
anya-e0703n0:95_0: Nātho taṃ saṃkhipi dhammaṃ, tadā devā samāgamuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:96_0: Tasmiṃ samāgame tesaṃ, satthā dhamma madesayi.
anya-e0703n0:99_0: Saraṇesu ca sīlesu, ṭhitā āsuṃ asaṃkhiyā.
anya-e0703n0:105_0: Pāṇimatteadā kese, tassa pāṇa hito jino.
anya-e0703n0:137_0: Bodhito pañcame vasse, vasaṃ jetavane jino.
anya-e0703n0:155_0: Datvā kālakatā nāgī, mātulena tathā hi so.
anya-e0703n0:166_0: Devo hi so nāgadīpe, manusso’nantare bhave;
anya-e0703n0:176_0: Idaṃ ṭhāna hitatthañca, taṃ sarukkhaṃ idhānayi.
anya-e0703n0:179_0: Tamaṃ tamonudo tesaṃ, nāgānaṃ hiṃsanaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n0:182_0: Te disvā sugataṃ tuṭṭhā, pāde vandiṃsu satthuno.
anya-e0703n0:185_0: Ubho’pi te patītā taṃ, pallaṅkaṃ munino aduṃ.
anya-e0703n0:194_0: Kalyāṇiyaṃ nāgarājā, yuddhaṃ kātuṃ tahiṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:199_0: Mahatī anukampāno, katā nātha tayā ayaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:202_0: Anukampā mahī pite, visuṃ hotu mahodaya;
anya-e0703n0:212_0: Taṃ bhavissati votātā, hitāya ca sukhāya ca.
anya-e0703n0:224_0: Bodhito aṭṭhame vasse, vasaṃ jetavane jino;
anya-e0703n0:240_0: Uggantvā sumane kūṭe, padaṃ dassesi nāyako.
anya-e0703n0:260_0: Evaṃ laṅkāya nātho, hitamamitamatī āyatiṃ pekkhamāno;
anya-e0703n0:274_0: Rojo ca vararojo ca, tathā kalyāṇakā duve;
anya-e0703n0:278_0: Mucalindo sāgaro ceva, sāgaro deva vanāmako.
anya-e0703n0:280_0: Bharato bhagīratho ceva, ruci ca suruci pica;
anya-e0703n0:281_0: Patāpo mahāpatāpo, panādā ca tathā duve.
anya-e0703n0:283_0: Sudassano ca neru ca, tathā eva duve duve;
anya-e0703n0:289_0: Tato satañca rājano, chappaññāsa ca saṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0703n0:290_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, chattiṃsā ca tato pare.
anya-e0703n0:292_0: Dvattiṃsa aṭṭhavīsā ca, dvāvīsati tato pare;
anya-e0703n0:295_0: Nava satta dvādasa ca, pañcavīsa tatopare;
anya-e0703n0:296_0: Pañcavīsaṃ dvādasa ca, dvādasañca navā pica.
anya-e0703n0:301_0: Soḷasa yāva okkātaṃ, paputtā rāsito ime;
anya-e0703n0:302_0: Visuṃ visuṃ pure rajjaṃ, kamato anusāsisuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:305_0: Nipuro candīmā candaṃ-mukho ca sivi sañjayo.
anya-e0703n0:308_0: Sīhassaro ca iccete, tassa putta pa puttakā.
anya-e0703n0:311_0: Putta pa putta rājāno, jayaseno tadantimo.
anya-e0703n0:319_0: Añjano cā’tha kaccānā, āsuṃ tassa sutā duve;
anya-e0703n0:323_0: Añjanassa duve dhītā, māyā cātha pajāpati.
anya-e0703n0:325_0: Puttā duve daṇḍapāṇī, suppabuddho ca sākiyo;
anya-e0703n0:326_0: Pañca puttā duve dhītā, āsuṃ sīhahanussare.
anya-e0703n0:329_0: Amitā pamitācā’ti, ime pañca imā duve.
anya-e0703n0:335_0: Suddhodana mahārañño, putto māyāya so jino.
anya-e0703n0:338_0: Evaṃ pavatte sañjāto, sabba khatthiya muddhani.
anya-e0703n0:344_0: Ubhinnaṃ pitaro cāpi, sahāyāeva te ahuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:349_0: Padahitvāna chabbassaṃ, bodhiṃ patvā kamena ca;
anya-e0703n0:353_0: Abhisitto mahāpañño, patto rajjassa tassa tu.
anya-e0703n0:356_0: Dvāpaññāseva vassāni, rajjaṃ kāresi so pana.
anya-e0703n0:365_0: Pacchā so kārayī rajjaṃ, vassāni catuvīsati.
anya-e0703n0:378_0: Ṭhatvā sabbāni kiccāni, katvā lokassa sabbathā.
anya-e0703n0:384_0: Khattiyā brāhmaṇā vassā, suddhā devā tatheva ca.
anya-e0703n0:405_0: Sammanni kātuṃ saṃgītiṃ, sā na sakkā hi taṃ vinā.
anya-e0703n0:429_0: Rājā katthāti pucchitvā, vuttaṭhānamhi tehi so.
anya-e0703n0:434_0: Sabbathā maṇḍayitvā taṃ, attharāpesi tattha so;
anya-e0703n0:443_0: Rājā’rocayi therānaṃ, kammaṃ no niṭṭhitaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n0:446_0: Sve sannipāto ānanda, sekhena gamanaṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:447_0: Na yuttante sadatthe tvaṃ, appamatto tato bhava.
anya-e0703n0:449_0: Iccevaṃ codito thero, katvāna vīriyaṃ samaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:452_0: Vassānaṃ dutiye māse, dutiye divase pana;
anya-e0703n0:453_0: Rucire maṇḍape tasmiṃ, therā sannipatiṃsu te.
anya-e0703n0:498_0: Te yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā, therā sabbepi nibbutā.
anya-e0703n0:529_0: Kāḷāso ko tassa putto, aṭṭhavīsati kārayi.
anya-e0703n0:541_0: Taṃ sutvāna yasatthero, evaṃ vajjīsu cārikaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:549_0: Na kappate taṃ mā detha, iti thero savārayi;
anya-e0703n0:552_0: Yācitvā anudūtaṃ so, saha tena puraṃ gato;
anya-e0703n0:558_0: Thero uggamma nabhasā, gantvā kosambiyaṃ tato;
anya-e0703n0:567_0: Bhikkhavo sannipatitā, sabbe tattha tato tato;
anya-e0703n0:571_0: Taṃ kālapamukhaṃ ñatvā, passituṃ nikkhamiṃsu taṃ.
anya-e0703n0:573_0: Thero tammantanaṃ sutvā, vesāliṃ gantumeva so;
anya-e0703n0:594_0: Upecca taṃ mahābrahmā, dhamme niṭṭhāti abravi;
anya-e0703n0:595_0: Niccaṃ dhamme ṭhitattaṃ so, attano tassa abravi.
anya-e0703n0:598_0: Thero na gaṇhi tappakkha-gāhī sissaṃ paṇāmayī.
anya-e0703n0:600_0: Vesāliṃ te tato gantvā, tato pupphapuraṃ gatā;
anya-e0703n0:603_0: Satthussa no gandhakuṭiṃ, gopayanto mayaṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:613_0: Navutiñca sahassāni, ahu taṃ vatthu santiyā.
anya-e0703n0:616_0: Thero sabbepi bhikkhū te, vesālimāgamuṃ tato.
anya-e0703n0:621_0: Pesetvā te mahīpālo, taṃ rattiṃ supinenaso;
anya-e0703n0:624_0: Atibhīto ahu rājā, tamassā setu māgamā;
anya-e0703n0:627_0: Bhāriyaṃ te kataṃ kammaṃ, dhammike’yye khamāpaya;
anya-e0703n0:628_0: Pakkho tesaṃ bhavitvā tvaṃ, kuru sāsanapaggahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:630_0: Evaṃ kate sotthi tuyhaṃ, hessatīti apakkami;
anya-e0703n0:636_0: Khamāpetvā dhammike te, bhikkhū sabbe mahīpati;
anya-e0703n0:640_0: Datvā ca tesaṃ ārakkhaṃ, agamāsi sakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:642_0: Nicchetuṃ tāni vatthūni, saṅgho sannipatī tadā;
anya-e0703n0:646_0: Ubbhāhikāya taṃ vatthuṃ, sametuṃ nicchayaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n0:649_0: Ubbhāhikāya sammanni, bhikkhū taṃ vatthu santiyā.
anya-e0703n0:662_0: Daharenā’ji te nettha, paññatte āsane subhe;
anya-e0703n0:665_0: Tesu vatthūsu ekekaṃ, kamato revato mahā;
anya-e0703n0:666_0: Thero theraṃ sabbakāmiṃ, pucchi pucchāsu kovido.
anya-e0703n0:669_0: Sabbāni tāni vatthūni, na kappantīti suttato.
anya-e0703n0:686_0: Vāsabhagāmiko ceva, sumano ca duve pana.
anya-e0703n0:689_0: Aṭṭha therā’pi dhaññā te, diṭṭhapubbā tathāgataṃ.
anya-e0703n0:703_0: Pubbe kataṃ tathā eva, dhammaṃ pacchā ca bhāsitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:704_0: Ādāya niṭṭhapesuṃ taṃ, etaṃ māsehi aṭṭhahi.
anya-e0703n0:735_0: Vajjīputtakabhikkhū ca, duve jātā ime khalu.
anya-e0703n0:741_0: Dhammaguttiyabhikkhū ca, jātā khalu ime duve.
anya-e0703n0:744_0: Jātā saṅkantikā bhikkhū, suttavādā tato pana.
anya-e0703n0:746_0: Theravādena saha te, honti dvādasi’mepi ca;
anya-e0703n0:747_0: Pubbe vuttachavādā ca, iti aṭṭhārasā khilā.
anya-e0703n0:763_0: Nava nandā tato āsuṃ, kameneva narādhipā;
anya-e0703n0:775_0: Bindusārasutā āsuṃ, sataṃ eko ca vissutā;
anya-e0703n0:778_0: Vemātike bhātaro so, hantvā ekūnakaṃ sataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:788_0: Yojane yojane āṇā, niccaṃ pavattitā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:791_0: Devā devo akā tehi, saṃvibhāgaṃ janassaca.
anya-e0703n0:815_0: Akaṃsu mūsikā tehi, bhattaṃ rājakule ahu.
anya-e0703n0:830_0: Bhojesi sopi teyeva, tīṇi vassāni bhojayi.
anya-e0703n0:842_0: Sumanassa kumārassa, putto so hi kumārako.
anya-e0703n0:847_0: Katvā puraṃ sakāyattaṃ, mate pitari bhātaraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:848_0: Ghātetvā jeṭṭhakaṃ rajjaṃ, aggahesi pure vare.
anya-e0703n0:856_0: Tadahe’va varaṃ puttaṃ, vijāyitvā sutassa sā;
anya-e0703n0:859_0: Disvā taṃ jeṭṭhacaṇḍālo, attano sāminiṃ viya;
anya-e0703n0:862_0: Taṃ mahāvaruṇo thero, tadā disvā kumārakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:874_0: Pubbe kira tayo āsuṃ, bhātaro madhu vāṇijā;
anya-e0703n0:875_0: Eko madhuṃ vikkiṇāti, āharanti madhuṃ duve.
anya-e0703n0:881_0: Titthaṃ jalatthaṃ gacchanti, ekā ceṭī tamaddasa.
anya-e0703n0:884_0: Eso madhvāpaṇo bhante, tattha gacchā’ti abravi.
anya-e0703n0:886_0: Tattha pattassa buddhassa, vāṇijo so pasādavā;
anya-e0703n0:890_0: Disvā madhuṃ pasanno so, evaṃ paṇidahī tadā.
anya-e0703n0:893_0: Ākāse yojane āṇā, bhūmiyaṃ yojaneti ca.
anya-e0703n0:895_0: Bhātare āgate āha, edisassa madhuṃ adaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:896_0: Anumodatha tumhe taṃ, tumhākañca yato madhu.
anya-e0703n0:906_0: Āpaṇā desikaṃ yātu, devittaṃ tassa patthayi;
anya-e0703n0:912_0: Caṇḍālavādī caṇḍāla-gāme āsi yato tu so;
anya-e0703n0:913_0: Patthesi mokkhaṃ mokkhañca, satta vassova pāpuṇi.
anya-e0703n0:915_0: Niviṭṭhapemo tasmiṃ so, rājā’ti turito tato;
anya-e0703n0:916_0: Pakkosāpesi taṃ so tu, santavuttī upāgami.
anya-e0703n0:922_0: Ajjā’yaṃ sāmaṇero me, ghare hessati sāmiko.
anya-e0703n0:924_0: Ālambitvā karaṃ rañño, so pallaṅke samāruhi;
anya-e0703n0:927_0: Disvā tathā nisinnaṃ taṃ, asoko so mahīpati;
anya-e0703n0:934_0: Taṃ sutvā bhūmipālo so, pasanno jinasāsane.
anya-e0703n0:936_0: Aṭṭha te niccabhattāni, dammi tātā’ti āha taṃ;
anya-e0703n0:937_0: Upajjhāyassa me rāja, tāni dammīti āha so.
anya-e0703n0:939_0: Puna aṭṭhasu dinnesu, tāna’dā cariyassa so;
anya-e0703n0:945_0: Sahatthā tappito raññā, dhammaṃ desiya bhūpatiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:950_0: Tato rājā pasanno so, diguṇena dine dine;
anya-e0703n0:960_0: Gharaṃ netvāna bhojetvā, datvā sāmaṇakaṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:975_0: Paccekaṃ satasahassaṃ, so dāpesi dine dine.
anya-e0703n0:984_0: Te piṭakānaṃ therānaṃ, saṭṭhiye’kaṃ dine dine.
anya-e0703n0:1002_0: Rūpaṃ anantañāṇassa, dassehi mama bho iti.
anya-e0703n0:1008_0: Taṃ disvā’ti pasādassa, vimhayassa ca pūrito.
anya-e0703n0:1010_0: Etena nimmitaṃ rūpaṃ, īdisaṃ kīdisaṃ nukho;
anya-e0703n0:1016_0: Evaṃ mahānubhāvo ca, saddho cāpi mahīpati;
anya-e0703n0:1017_0: Thero ca moggaliputto, diṭṭhā pubbe vasīhi te.
anya-e0703n0:1034_0: Upaddavo sāsanassa, na sambhossāma taṃ mayaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:1042_0: Kāle tumhesu eko taṃ, pabbājetu kumārakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:1057_0: Vedesu gaṇṭhiṭhānāni, pucchi so tāni byākari.
anya-e0703n0:1060_0: Sabbe dhammā osaranti, ekadhammo hi ko nu so.
anya-e0703n0:1062_0: Iccāha nāmaṃ sandhāya, thero māṇavako tu so;
anya-e0703n0:1065_0: Dehīti āha so āha, dema no vesadhārino;
anya-e0703n0:1066_0: Guruṃ āpucchi mantatthaṃ, mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā.
anya-e0703n0:1083_0: Sagaṇaṃ dāsakaṃ theraṃ, tattha disvā pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n0:1084_0: Pabbajjaṃ yāci so āha, tavā’puccha guruṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:1114_0: Pāhesuṃ saṅghavacanaṃ, vuṭṭhāya sa tahiṃ agā.
anya-e0703n0:1116_0: Kumāro pucchi kiṃ bhante, nālapitthāti āha so;
anya-e0703n0:1117_0: Bhuñjimha bhuñjitabbanti, āha bhojetha no api.
anya-e0703n0:1119_0: Āha amhādise jāhe, sakkā bhojayituṃ iti;
anya-e0703n0:1128_0: Ñatvā tissa paṭisandhiṃ, tato pabhuti siggavo;
anya-e0703n0:1129_0: Thero so sattavassāni, taṃ gharaṃ upasaṅkami.
anya-e0703n0:1132_0: Alattha aṭṭhame vasse, gacchāti vacanaṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:1135_0: Kiñci laddhaṃ ghare noti, pucchi āmāti so’bravi.
anya-e0703n0:1137_0: Gharaṃ gantvāna pucchitvā, dutiye divase tato;
anya-e0703n0:1140_0: Therassa vacanaṃ sutvā, so pasannamano dvijo;
anya-e0703n0:1144_0: Bhojāpesi dijo niccaṃ, nisīdāpiya taṃ ghare.
anya-e0703n0:1153_0: Tasmā so tassa pallaṅko, vāsayitvā lagīyati.
anya-e0703n0:1156_0: Tassa taṃ āsanaṃ tassa, paññapesi ghare jano.
anya-e0703n0:1161_0: Thero māṇava kiṃ mantaṃ, jānāsīti tamabravi;
anya-e0703n0:1162_0: Tameva pucchaṃ therassa, pacchā rocesi māṇavo.
anya-e0703n0:1173_0: Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhisati na uppajjissati;
anya-e0703n0:1176_0: Taṃ cittayamake pañhaṃ, pucchi thero visārado;
anya-e0703n0:1177_0: Andhakāro viya ahu, tassa so tamavoca so.
anya-e0703n0:1179_0: Bhikkhuko nāma mantoti, buddha mantoti so bravi;
anya-e0703n0:1180_0: Dehīti vutte novesa-dhārino dammi taṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:1186_0: Sotāphattiphalaṃ patto, thero ñatvāna taṃ tathā.
anya-e0703n0:1198_0: Ekāhaṃ uparājā so, adakkhi migavaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n0:1204_0: Attano cintitaṃ rañño, ārocesi gharaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n0:1205_0: Saññāpetuṃ tu sattāhaṃ, rajjaṃ tassa adāsi so.
anya-e0703n0:1207_0: Anubhohi ime rajjaṃ, sattāhaṃ tvaṃ kumāraka;
anya-e0703n0:1215_0: Sattāhā’haṃ marissaṃti, tvaṃ na kīḷi ime kathaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:1218_0: Iccevaṃ bhākarā vutto, sāsanasmiṃ pasīdi so;
anya-e0703n0:1224_0: Ayaṃ thero viyā’hampi, pabbajja jina sāsane;
anya-e0703n0:1225_0: Viharissaṃ kadā raññe, iti cintayi paññavā.
anya-e0703n0:1235_0: Taṃ iddhiṃ uparājā so, disvā’tīva pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n0:1267_0: Janena paribhuttesu, ṭhānesu ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:1276_0: Pure bheriṃ carāpesi, sattame divase ito;
anya-e0703n0:1300_0: Tasmiṃ samāgame āsuṃ, asīti bhikkhukoṭi yo;
anya-e0703n0:1304_0: Khiṇāsavā bhikkhuniyo, sahassaṃ āsu tāsu tu.
anya-e0703n0:1313_0: Passi sabbe vihāre ca, nānāpūjā vibhūsite.
anya-e0703n0:1315_0: Atīva tuṭṭho te disvā, saṅghaṃ pucchi nisīdiya;
anya-e0703n0:1318_0: Thero so moggaliputto, rañño pañhaṃ viyākari;
anya-e0703n0:1321_0: Taṃ sutvā vacanaṃ bhiyyo, tuṭṭho rājā apucchi taṃ;
anya-e0703n0:1322_0: Buddhasāsana dāyādo, hoti kho mādiso iti.

anya-e0703n0:2329_0: Tesañca khandhāvāramhi, duve vassāni so vasī.
anya-e0703n0:2335_0: Taṃ sutvā tassa kujjiṃsu, bhātaro nava rājino.
anya-e0703n0:2337_0: Upatthambho tvamevā’si, ciraṃ tassa idāni tu;
anya-e0703n0:2338_0: Raṭṭhaṃ dadāsi tasmā tvaṃ, māressāmā’ti abravuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:2340_0: So tesaṃ rajjamappesi, te tissaṃ nāma bhātaraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:2353_0: Pacchato agataṃ disvā, bhītā tejena tassasā.
anya-e0703n0:2356_0: Dhāvamānā saraṃ haṃ sā, sattakkhattuṃ parikkhipi.
anya-e0703n0:2361_0: Taṃ saraṃ puna tikkhattuṃ, parikkhipi tato puna;
anya-e0703n0:2362_0: Gaṅgaṃ kacchakatitthena, samotari tahiṃ tu so.
anya-e0703n0:2365_0: Tassa puññānubhāvena, so ahosi mahā asi.
anya-e0703n0:2368_0: Rajjaṃ gahetvā te dajjaṃ, sāmi māmaṃ amārayi.
anya-e0703n0:2370_0: Gīvāya taṃ gahetvā so, vijjhitvā asikoṭiyā;
anya-e0703n0:2371_0: Nāsāya rajjuyā bandhi, sā ahosi vasānugā.
anya-e0703n0:2373_0: Gantvā taṃ dhumarakkhaṃ so, tamāruyha mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n0:2374_0: Tattha cattāri vassāni, dhūmarakkhana ge vasi.
anya-e0703n0:2389_0: Iti vatvāna pesesi, kumāro purato balaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:2391_0: Gaṇhissāmi paviṭṭhanti, vissaṭṭhesu tu tesu so;
anya-e0703n0:2398_0: Ghātetvā mātule ca’ttha, sīsarāsiṃ akaṃsu te.
anya-e0703n0:2409_0: Attano rājagehaṃ so, tassa datvāna ayyako;
anya-e0703n0:2410_0: Aññatthavāsaṃ kappesi, so tu tasmiṃ ghare vasi.
anya-e0703n0:2428_0: Aghātayitvā jeṭṭhaṃ taṃ, mātulaṃ abhayaṃ pana.
anya-e0703n0:2436_0: Saraṃ tañca khaṇāpetvā, kārāpesi bahū dakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:2440_0: Yakkhaṃ tu cittarājaṃ taṃ, heṭṭho abhayavāpiyā.
anya-e0703n0:2448_0: Dāpesi chaṇakāle tu, cittarājena so saha;
anya-e0703n0:2494_0: Sivikā sotthisālā ca, akāresi tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:2548_0: Ekā kusumā yaṭṭhītu, kusumāni tahiṃ pana;
anya-e0703n0:2552_0: Nānā ca nānāvaṇṇā ca, sajīvā viya dissare.
anya-e0703n0:2557_0: Muttāsamudā uggantvā, tīre vaṭṭi viya ṭhitā;
anya-e0703n0:2564_0: Tāni disvā patīto so, rājā iti vicintayi.
anya-e0703n0:2569_0: Devānaṃ piyatisso ca, dhammāsoko ca te ime;
anya-e0703n0:2573_0: Dijaṃ amaccaṃ gaṇataṃ, rājā te caturo jane.
anya-e0703n0:2576_0: Gāhā petvā anagghāni, ratanāni imāni so.
anya-e0703n0:2578_0: Maṇijātī ca tisso tā, tisso ca rathayaṭṭhiyo;
anya-e0703n0:2579_0: Saṅkhañca dakkhiṇāvattaṃ, muttā jātī ca aṭṭha tā.
anya-e0703n0:2582_0: Sukhena titthaṃ laddhāna, sattāhena tato puna.
anya-e0703n0:2585_0: Adaṃsu paṇṇākārete, disvā tāni pasīdi so.
anya-e0703n0:2593_0: Tesaṃ anappake bhoge, datvā vāsagharāni ca;
anya-e0703n0:2614_0: Ahaṃ buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n0:2627_0: Oruyha kūpaṃ passiṃsu, patvā dvādasiyaṃ idha.
anya-e0703n0:2652_0: Pesesi kattike māse, tete there tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:2664_0: Suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ there dve, soṇamuttara meva ca.
anya-e0703n0:2682_0: Vātā mahantā vāyanti, megho gajjati vassati.
anya-e0703n0:2690_0: Sabbaṃ taṃ iddhiyā thero, paṭibāhiya bhiṃsanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:2693_0: Sadeva kopi ce loko, āgantvā tāsayeyya maṃ;
anya-e0703n0:2694_0: Na me paṭibalo assa, janetuṃ bhayabheravaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:2696_0: Sace’pi tvaṃ mahiṃ sabbaṃ, sasamuddaṃ sapabbataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:2708_0: Paṇḍako nāma yakkho tu, saddhiṃhārita yakkhiyā;
anya-e0703n0:2714_0: Karotha mettaṃ sattesu, vasantu manujā sukhaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:2768_0: Gantvā catūhi therehi, desesi majjhimo isi;
anya-e0703n0:2778_0: Suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ agamā, tasmiṃ tu samaye pana.
anya-e0703n0:2788_0: Iti cintiya māretuṃ, sā yuvā upasaṅkamuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:2791_0: Samaṇā mayaṃ himavantā, na rakkhasi sahāyakā;
anya-e0703n0:2792_0: Rakkhasī sā saparisā, nikkhantā hoti sāgarā.
anya-e0703n0:2798_0: Idaṃ imehi uddhanti, mantvā bhītā palāyisā.
anya-e0703n0:2803_0: Saraṇesu ca sīlesu, aṭṭhaṃsu bahavo janā;
anya-e0703n0:2839_0: Sampatvā mataraṃ passi, devī disvā piyaṃ sutaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:2845_0: So asoka kumāro hi, ujjenīgamanā purā.
anya-e0703n0:2847_0: Vedise nagare vāsaṃ, upagantvā tahiṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:2850_0: Saṃvāsaṃ tāya kappesi, gabbhaṃ gaṇhiya tena sā;
anya-e0703n0:2851_0: Ujjeniyaṃ kumāraṃ taṃ, mahindaṃ janayī subhaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:2854_0: Tasmiṃ kāle vasati sā, vedise nagare tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:2856_0: Thero tattha nisīditvā, kālaññū iti cintayi;
anya-e0703n0:2871_0: Therena deviyā dhammaṃ, sutvā desitameva tu;
anya-e0703n0:2877_0: Saddhiṃ tena gahaṭṭhena, na rato ñātihetunā;
anya-e0703n0:2878_0: Tasmā vihārā ākāsaṃ, uggantvā so mahiddhiko.
anya-e0703n0:2902_0: Rājā disvā “pamattaṃ taṃ, na yuttaṃ vijjhituṃ” iti;
anya-e0703n0:2911_0: Bhīto aṭṭhāsi taṃ thero, “ehi tissāti abravi;
anya-e0703n0:2917_0: Iccāha thero taṃ sutvā, rājā vītabhayo ahu;
anya-e0703n0:2920_0: Dhanuṃ sarañca nikkhippa, upasaṅkamma taṃ isiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:2923_0: Tadā tassa manussā te, āgamma parivārayuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:2924_0: Tadā sese cha dassesi, mahāthero sahāgate.
anya-e0703n0:2926_0: Te disvā abravī rājā, “kadā” me āgatā iti;
anya-e0703n0:2927_0: “Mayā saddhiṃ”ti therena, vutte pucchi idaṃ puna.
anya-e0703n0:2939_0: Puṭṭho puṭṭho viyākāsi, taṃtaṃ pañhaṃ mahīpati.
anya-e0703n0:2941_0: Rukkhoyaṃ rājakinnāmo, añño nāma ayaṃ taru;
anya-e0703n0:2942_0: Imaṃ muñciya attha’mbo, santi ambatarū bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:2945_0: Santi bhante bahu rukkhā, anambāpana te taru.
anya-e0703n0:2947_0: Aññe ambe anambe ca, muñciya’tthi mahīruhā;
anya-e0703n0:2950_0: Santi te ñātakā rāja, santi bhante bahujjanā;
anya-e0703n0:2951_0: Santi aññātakā rāja, santi te ñātito bahū.
anya-e0703n0:2953_0: Ñātake te ca aññe ca, muñciya’ññopi atthi nu;
anya-e0703n0:2963_0: “Na bhuñjissa”nti dāni me, iti janammi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n0:2966_0: Na bhuñjāma idānī’ti, vutte kālañca pucchiso.
anya-e0703n0:2969_0: Tuvaṃ gaccha mahārāja, vasissāma mayaṃ idha.
anya-e0703n0:2971_0: Evaṃ sati kumāro’yaṃ, amhehi saha gacchatu;
anya-e0703n0:2975_0: Idāni pabbajessāma, imaṃ tvaṃ gaccha bhūmipa.
anya-e0703n0:2977_0: Pāto rathaṃ pesayissaṃ, tumhe tattha ṭhitā puraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:2986_0: Thero taṃ gāmasīmāyaṃ, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe akā;
anya-e0703n0:2990_0: Sumanaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ taṃ, thero āmantayī tato.
anya-e0703n0:2993_0: Sāvento kittakaṃ ṭhānaṃ, bhante ghosema’haṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:2999_0: Bhuñjanto taṃ ravaṃ sutvā, therantika mapesayi.
anya-e0703n0:3007_0: Tena ghosena devānaṃ, sannipāto mahā ahu;
anya-e0703n0:3011_0: Bahū nāgā supaṇṇā ca, saraṇesu patiṭṭhayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3016_0: Rājā pabhā te pāhesi, rathaṃ sārathi so gato;
anya-e0703n0:3019_0: Nā’rohāma rathaṃ gaccha, gacchāma tava pacchato;
anya-e0703n0:3037_0: Tadantare sārathi so, there disvā tahiṃ ṭhite;
anya-e0703n0:3040_0: Gantvā rañño nivedesi, sutvā sabbaṃ mahīmati;
anya-e0703n0:3052_0: Narindo pūjayanto te, there antepuraṃ nayi;
anya-e0703n0:3065_0: Desesi thero tā itthī, paṭhamaṃ phalamajjhaguṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3071_0: Sutvā pucchiya jānitvā, āha tesaṃ hitatthiko.
anya-e0703n0:3082_0: Taṃ sutvāna pasīdiṃsu, nagarā te samāgatā;
anya-e0703n0:3101_0: Nikkhamma dakkhiṇadvārā, thero tattha nisīdi ca;
anya-e0703n0:3110_0: Tato therā nikkhamiṃsu, “yāma taṃ pabbataṃ” iti;
anya-e0703n0:3125_0: Taṃ nandanā dakkhiṇena, nayaṃ theraṃ rathesabho;
anya-e0703n0:3132_0: Puraṃ pāvisi therā tu, taṃ rattiṃ tattha te vasuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3135_0: There upacca vanditvā, pūjetvā kusumehi ca.
anya-e0703n0:3137_0: Pucchi kacci sukhaṃ vuṭṭhaṃ, uyyānaṃ phāsukaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n0:3138_0: Sukhaṃ vutthaṃ mahārāja, uyyānaṃ yati phāsukaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3140_0: Ārāmo kappate bhante, saṅghassā”ti apucchi so;
anya-e0703n0:3144_0: Taṃ sutvā abhihaṭṭho so, tuṭṭhahaṭṭho mahājano.
anya-e0703n0:3161_0: Āgacchatū’ti pesehi, rañño no pitu santikaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3162_0: Pabbājessati sā therī, āgatā itthiyo imā.
anya-e0703n0:3168_0: Mahiyā patite toye, akampittha mahā mahī.
anya-e0703n0:3174_0: Thero rājagharaṃ gantvā, tassa dakkhiṇato ṭhito.
anya-e0703n0:3177_0: Tatthāpi puthavī kampi, puṭṭho tassā’ha kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3179_0: Ahosi tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ, kāle’pi idha mālako;
anya-e0703n0:3183_0: Tattakā neva pupphāni, thero tatthāpi okiri.
anya-e0703n0:3185_0: Tatthā’pi puthuvī kampi, puṭṭho tassā’ha kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3189_0: Tattakehe’va pupphehi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ pūjayī isi.
anya-e0703n0:3192_0: Rājā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchi, thero tassā’ha kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3203_0: Tathāpi puthavī kampi, puṭṭho tassā’ha kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3204_0: Saṅghassu posathā gāraṃ, idha hessati bhūmipa.
anya-e0703n0:3218_0: Ambaṭṭhikaṃ adā rājā, taṃ sayaṃ tattha ropayi;
anya-e0703n0:3221_0: Taṃ khaṇaṃyeva bījamhā, tamhā nikkhamma aṅkuro;
anya-e0703n0:3224_0: Taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā, parisā sā sarājikā;
anya-e0703n0:3227_0: Thero tadā pupphamuṭṭhi, aṭṭha tattha samokiri;
anya-e0703n0:3236_0: Taṃ kampakāraṇaṃ pucchi, rājā thero viyākari;
anya-e0703n0:3240_0: Idha ṭhapetvā bhojesuṃ, sasaṅghe sugate tayo.
anya-e0703n0:3251_0: Thūpārahaṃ thalaṭhānaṃ, ahu there tahiṃ gate;
anya-e0703n0:3255_0: Thero campakapupphehi, tehi pūjesi taṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3257_0: Tatthāpi puthavī kampi, rājā taṃ kampakāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3263_0: Imamhi kappe paṭhamaṃ, kakusandho jino ahu;
anya-e0703n0:3269_0: Kadamba nadiyā pāre, tattha rājā’bhayo ahu;
anya-e0703n0:3275_0: Taṃ gantvā sattavinayaṃ, pavattiṃ sāsanassa ca;
anya-e0703n0:3285_0: Sabbe maṃ ajja passantu, ojadīpamhi mānusā.
anya-e0703n0:3291_0: Rājā ca nāgarā ceva, disvā khippaṃ upāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3293_0: Devatā balidānatthaṃ, manussā ca tahiṃ gatā;
anya-e0703n0:3296_0: Rājā so munirājaṃ taṃ, atihaṭṭho’bhi vādiya;
anya-e0703n0:3302_0: Kārite maṇḍape ramme, pallaṅkesu vare sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3309_0: Santappesi sasaṅghaṃ taṃ, rājā so lokanāyakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3311_0: Idheva pacchābhattaṃ taṃ, nisinnassa jinassa so;
anya-e0703n0:3317_0: Ettheva so nisīditvā, dhammaṃ desesi nāyako;
anya-e0703n0:3323_0: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato;
anya-e0703n0:3326_0: Ādāya dakkhiṇaṃ sākhaṃ, bodhito me sirīsato;
anya-e0703n0:3329_0: Tassa taṃ cittamaññāya, sā therī tadanantaraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3330_0: Gahetvā tattha rājānaṃ, upasaṅkamma taṃ taruṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3339_0: Ṭhapesi dakkhiṇe hatthe, taṃ gahetvā tathāgato.
anya-e0703n0:3353_0: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato.
anya-e0703n0:3359_0: Datvā saparivāraṃ taṃ, ṭhapetvā idha bhikkhuniṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3362_0: Ṭhapetvā idha sambuddho, tato pācinato pana.
anya-e0703n0:3373_0: Samiddho nāma nāmena, tattha rājā tadā ahu;
anya-e0703n0:3374_0: Nāmena varadīpo’ti, ayaṃ dīpo tadā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:3379_0: Taṃ hutvā sattavinayaṃ, pavattiṃ sāsanassa ca;
anya-e0703n0:3395_0: Rājā ca nāgarā ceva, disvā khippamupāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3406_0: Kārite maṇḍape ramme, pallaṅkesu varesu taṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3417_0: Idheva pacchābhattaṃ taṃ, nisinnassa jinassa so;
anya-e0703n0:3423_0: Ettheva so nisīditvā, dhammaṃ desesi nāyako;
anya-e0703n0:3424_0: Tadā tiṃsa sahassāni, pattā maggaphalaṃ narā.
anya-e0703n0:3429_0: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato;
anya-e0703n0:3435_0: Tassa taṃ cittamaññāya, sā therī tadanantaraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3436_0: Gahetvā tattha rājānaṃ, upasaṅkamma taṃ taruṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3445_0: Ṭhapesi dakkhiṇe hatthe, taṃ gahetvā tathāgato.
anya-e0703n0:3457_0: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato.
anya-e0703n0:3459_0: Dhammaṃ desesi sambuddho, parisāya tahiṃ pana;
anya-e0703n0:3463_0: Datvā saparivāraṃ taṃ, ṭhapetvā idha bhikkhuniṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3471_0: Imamhi kappe tatiyaṃ, kassapo gottato jino;
anya-e0703n0:3477_0: Jayanto nāma nāmena, tattha rājā tadā ahu;
anya-e0703n0:3478_0: Nāmena maṇḍadīpoti, ayaṃ dīpo tadā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:3480_0: Tadā jayantarañño ca, rañño kaniṭṭhabhātu ca;
anya-e0703n0:3483_0: Kassapo so dasabalo, tena yuddhena pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3486_0: Taṃ hantvā sattavinayaṃ, pavattiṃ sāsanassa ca;
anya-e0703n0:3499_0: Rājā ca nāgarā ceva, disvā khippaṃ upāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3505_0: Rājā ca so kumāro ca, yuddhamujjhiṃsu vimhitā.
anya-e0703n0:3513_0: Kārite maṇḍape ramme, pallaṅkesu varesu taṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3520_0: Sasantappesi sasaṅghaṃ taṃ, rājā so lokanāyakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3522_0: Idhe’va pacchābhattaṃ taṃ, nisinnassa jinassa so;
anya-e0703n0:3528_0: Ettheva so nisīditvā, dhammaṃ desesi nāyako;
anya-e0703n0:3534_0: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato;
anya-e0703n0:3540_0: Tassa taṃ cittamaññāya, sā therī tadanantaraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3541_0: Gahetvā tattha rājānaṃ, upasaṅkamma taṃ taruṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3550_0: Ṭhapesi dakkhiṇe hatthe, taṃ gahetvā tathāgato.
anya-e0703n0:3562_0: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato.
anya-e0703n0:3564_0: Dhammaṃ desesi sambuddho, parisāya tahiṃ pana;
anya-e0703n0:3568_0: Datvā saparivāraṃ taṃ; Ṭhapetvā idha bhikkhunī.
anya-e0703n0:3576_0: Ahu imasmiṃ kappasmiṃ, catutthaṃ gotamo jino;
anya-e0703n0:3601_0: Idha aññāni kiccāni, bahūni tava bhūmipa.
anya-e0703n0:3603_0: Tāni kārehi nattāte, kāressati imaṃ pana;
anya-e0703n0:3607_0: Rājā goṭṭhābhayo nāma, tassa putto bhavissati.
anya-e0703n0:3610_0: Tassa rañño suto rāja, mahārājā bhavissati.
anya-e0703n0:3615_0: Iccāha thero therassa, vacane ne’ttha bhūpati;
anya-e0703n0:3624_0: Rañño ghare bhattakiccaṃ, katvā nikkhamma mandiraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3627_0: Suttaṃ janassa desetvā, sahassaṃ mānuse tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3634_0: Tissārāmaṃ agā thero, rājā ca sutadesano.
anya-e0703n0:3645_0: Tasmā katvā puraṃ anto-sīmaṃ bandhatha sajjukaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3654_0: Catutthe divase thero, rañño gehamhi bhuñjiya;
anya-e0703n0:3660_0: Pāto bheriṃ carāpetvā, maṇḍayitvā puraṃ varaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3672_0: Mahāpadumo kuñjaro ca, ubho nāgā sumaṅgalā;
anya-e0703n0:3693_0: Kenakena nimittena, sīmā ettha gatāti ce;
anya-e0703n0:3697_0: Tato kumbalavāṭaṃ taṃ, mahānipaṃ tato agā.
anya-e0703n0:3716_0: Tato marumbatittaṅgo, tato uddhaṃ nidiṃ agā;
anya-e0703n0:3717_0: Paṭhama cetiya pācine, dve kadambā ajāyisuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3740_0: Pañcame divase thero, rañño gehamhi bhuñjiya;
anya-e0703n0:3789_0: Therā passaya pariveṇaṃ, etaṃ tena pavuccati.
anya-e0703n0:3822_0: Theraṃ tattha gataṃ sutvā, rathaṃ āruyha bhūpati;
anya-e0703n0:3823_0: Deviyo dve ca ādāya, therassānupadaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n0:3835_0: Kathesi rañño taṃ sutvā, bhāgineyyo ca rājino.
anya-e0703n0:3846_0: Agamāsi puraṃ rājā, therā tattheva te vasuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3853_0: Sīmaṃ sīmātigo thero, bandhitvā tadaheva so.
anya-e0703n0:3874_0: Ciradiṭṭho hi sambuddho, satthā no manujādhipa;
anya-e0703n0:3875_0: Anāthavāsaṃ avasimha, natthi no pūjiyaṃ idha.
anya-e0703n0:3878_0: Āha dhātūsu diṭṭhesu, diṭṭho hoti jino” iti.
anya-e0703n0:3880_0: Vidito vo adhippāyo, thūpassa kāraṇe mayā;
anya-e0703n0:3881_0: Kāressāmi ahaṃ thūpaṃ, tumhe jānātha dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n0:3884_0: Rājā’ha sāmaṇeraṃ taṃ, kuto lacchāma dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n0:3893_0: Icchāha sāmaṇero so, sumano taṃ sumānasaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3898_0: Ehi tvaṃ bhadra sumana, gantvā pupphapuraṃ varaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3899_0: Ayyakaṃ te mahārājaṃ, evaṃ no vacanaṃ vada.
anya-e0703n0:3904_0: Munino dhātuyo dehi, pattaṃ bhuttañca satthunā;
anya-e0703n0:3907_0: Pattapūrā gahetvā tā, gantvā devapuraṃ varaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3908_0: Sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ taṃ, evaṃ no vacanaṃ vada.
anya-e0703n0:3913_0: Dāṭhaṃ tvameva pūjehi, akkhakaṃ dehi satthuno;
anya-e0703n0:3931_0: Taṃ dhātuṃ dhātupattañca, ādāya sumano tato;
anya-e0703n0:3937_0: Ṭhapesi dhātuyo sabbā, thero tattheva pabbate;
anya-e0703n0:3938_0: Missakaṃ pabbataṃ tasmā, āhu cetiya pabbataṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3943_0: Sacāyaṃ munino dhātu, chattaṃ namatu me sayaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3946_0: Sirasmiṃ me patiṭṭhātu, āgamma saha dhātuko;
anya-e0703n0:3947_0: Iti rājā vicintesi, cintitaṃ taṃ tathā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:3952_0: Haṭṭho hattī kuñcanādaṃ, akā kampittha medinī;
anya-e0703n0:3956_0: Dakkhiṇena ca dvārena, nikkhamitvā tato puna.
anya-e0703n0:3964_0: Manussadevo devehi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ rakkhitaṃ suciṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3968_0: Nāgo na icchitaṃ rājā, theraṃ pucchittha taṃ manaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:3971_0: Dhātuoropanaṃ tena, na iṭṭhamī’ti so bravi.
anya-e0703n0:3990_0: Rattiṃ nāgo’nupariyāti, taṃ ṭhānaṃ so sadhātu kaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:3997_0: Tato tato samanto ca, samāgami mahājano.
anya-e0703n0:4030_0: Akāsi tasmā sā dhātu, tadā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:4035_0: Patiṭṭhitāya tassā ca, dhātuyā cetiye tadā;
anya-e0703n0:4041_0: Taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā, pasīdiṃsu jane janā;
anya-e0703n0:4050_0: Tatho’patissagāmā ca, pañca pañca satāni ca;
anya-e0703n0:4053_0: Evaṃ purā bāhirā ca, sabbe pabbajitā tadā;
anya-e0703n0:4059_0: Rājorodhā khattiyā ca, amaccā nāgarā tathā;
anya-e0703n0:4060_0: Sabbe janapadā ceva, pujā’kaṃsu visuṃ visuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:4087_0: Sakkhissāmi ahaṃ deva, ānetuṃ taṃ duve tato;
anya-e0703n0:4090_0: Evaṃ hotūti vatvāna, rājā taṃ tattha pesayi;
anya-e0703n0:4091_0: So therassa ca rañño ca, sāsanaṃ gayha vandiya.
anya-e0703n0:4121_0: Gantvā pitusamīpaṃ sā, therī theramataṃ bravī.
anya-e0703n0:4123_0: Āha rājā tuvaṃ amma, apassanto kathaṃ ahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:4126_0: Āha sā me mahārāja, bhātuno vacanaṃ garu;
anya-e0703n0:4127_0: Pabbājanīyā ca bahū, gantabbaṃ tattha tena me.
anya-e0703n0:4130_0: Kathannu sākhaṃ gaṇissaṃ”, iti rājā vicintayī.
anya-e0703n0:4135_0: Bhante laṃkaṃ mahābodhi, pesetabbā nu kho iti;
anya-e0703n0:4139_0: Ābhāsi rañño taṃ sutvā, tussitvā dharaṇīpati.
anya-e0703n0:4213_0: Evaṃ satena mūlānaṃ, tattha sā gandhakaddame;
anya-e0703n0:4225_0: Sayaṃ nādehi tūriyānaṃ, devesu mānusesu ca;
anya-e0703n0:4237_0: Rājā oruyha pīṭhamhā, taṃ sattāhaṃ tahiṃ vasaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:4253_0: Nānāpūjāhi sattāhaṃ, puna tattheva so vasi.
anya-e0703n0:4261_0: Pūjento taṃ dinaṃyeva, upanetvā sakaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:4323_0: Eva mevā’bhi pūjetu, rājā rajjena me sakhā”.
anya-e0703n0:4325_0: Idaṃ vatvā mahārājā, tīre pañjaliko ṭhito;
anya-e0703n0:4363_0: Tasmiṃṭhāne katā sālā, pakā setuṃ tamabbhutaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:4390_0: Therassa sutvā kāretvā, saññāṇāni tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:4394_0: Ṭhapāpetvā mahābodhiṃ, ṭhānesu tesu tesu ca.
anya-e0703n0:4415_0: Uggantvāna ṭhitā muñci, chabbaṇṇā rasmiyo subhā.
anya-e0703n0:4438_0: Sattāhā tikkame meghā, sabbe apagamiṃsu te;
anya-e0703n0:4439_0: Mahābodhi ca dissittha, chabbaṇṇā raṃsiyopi ca.
anya-e0703n0:4445_0: Tivakka brāhmaṇo ceva, dīpavāsī janāpi ca.
anya-e0703n0:4463_0: Mahābodhi ṭhita ṭhāne, nāvāyo rohane tadā.
anya-e0703n0:4487_0: Sasaṅghā saṅghamittā sā, mahātherī tahiṃ vasi.
anya-e0703n0:4493_0: Ekasmiṃ piya mekasmiṃ, arittaṃ tehi teviduṃ.
anya-e0703n0:4502_0: Hatthiṃ tattharataṃ ñatvā, akaṃsu tattha āḷhakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:4504_0: Atheka divasaṃ hatthī, nagaṇhi kabaḷāni so;
anya-e0703n0:4505_0: Dīpappasādakaṃ theraṃ, rājā so pucchitaṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0703n0:4510_0: Sadhātukaṃ tattha thūpaṃ, thūpassa gharameva ca;
anya-e0703n0:4523_0: Gantvā tattha gataṃ sutvā, gantvāna tattha vandiya.
anya-e0703n0:4526_0: Tassā ñatvā adhippāyaṃ, adhippāya vidū vidū.
anya-e0703n0:4550_0: Tato dvādasame vasse, mahesī tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n0:4556_0: Tato tu tatiye vasse, sābālā rūpamāninī;
anya-e0703n0:4557_0: “Mayāpi ca ayaṃ rājā, mahābodhiṃ ma māyati”.
anya-e0703n0:4562_0: Tato ca tutthevassamhi, dhammā soko mahāyaso;
anya-e0703n0:4565_0: Devānaṃ piyatisso tu, rājā dhammaguṇe rato;
anya-e0703n0:4577_0: Hatthikkhandhe ṭhapetvā tā, dhātuyo idha āhara;
anya-e0703n0:4578_0: Iti vutto satherena, tathā āhari dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n0:4592_0: Yā yā mahāmahindena, therena vasitā guhā;
anya-e0703n0:4628_0: Ayaṃ dīpo ahu ṭhito, vijite tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n0:4631_0: Tassa’cca ye taṃ kaniṭṭho, uttiyo iti vissuto;
anya-e0703n0:4632_0: Rājaputto aputtaṃ taṃ, rajjaṃ kāresi sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:4638_0: Laṃkāyaso satthu kappo, katvā laṃkāhitaṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:4647_0: Tena taṃ divasaṃ nāma, aṭṭhamiyāti sammataṃ.]
anya-e0703n0:4650_0: Gantvāna theraṃ vanditvā kanditvā bahudhā bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:4677_0: Karonto tattha netvā taṃ, kūṭāgāraṃ manoramaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:4683_0: Sabbesu ca vihāresu, thūpe kāresi khattiyo.
anya-e0703n0:4700_0: Sabbā alaṅkatā laṃkā, therassa viya āsi ca;
anya-e0703n0:4707_0: Thūpañca tattha kāresi, uttiyo so mahīpati.
anya-e0703n0:4718_0: Dasavassāni so rājā, rajjaṃ kāresi uttiyo;
anya-e0703n0:4721_0: Taṃ etaṃ atisāhasaṃ atibalaṃ na vāriyaṃ naro;
anya-e0703n0:4723_0: Nibbindo viratiṃ ratiṃ na kurute pāpehi puññehi ca;
anya-e0703n0:4732_0: Dasa vassāni kāresi, rajjaṃ sujana sevako.
anya-e0703n0:4740_0: Dakkhiṇāya disāyaṃ so, vihāraṃ nagaraṃ gaṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:4752_0: Pure rajjā ca rajje ca, saṭṭhīvassāni sādhukaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:4762_0: Te gahetvā aselo tu, muṭasivassa atrajo.
anya-e0703n0:4776_0: Eko putto ca dhītā ca, ahesuṃ tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n0:4783_0: Rājā teneva cakkena, sīsaṃ puttassa chedayi.
anya-e0703n0:4788_0: Āṇāpetvāna taṃ rājā, kucchiṃ tassa vidāḷiya;
anya-e0703n0:4806_0: Thūpaṃ pākatikaṃ katvā, khamāpehī”ti āhu taṃ.
anya-e0703n0:4808_0: Te ṭhapetuṃ pañcadasa, pāsāṇe patite tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:4811_0: Akā mahallikā vīhiṃ, so setuṃ ātape khipi;
anya-e0703n0:4812_0: Devo akāle vassitvā, tassā vihiṃ atemayi.
anya-e0703n0:4814_0: Vīhiṃ gahetvā gantvā sā, ghaṇṭaṃ taṃ samaghaṭṭayi;
anya-e0703n0:4827_0: Tatoppabhuti taṃ rajje, divā devo na vassatha.
anya-e0703n0:4861_0: Puttaṃ janesi so tassa, bhātu nāma makārayi.
anya-e0703n0:4871_0: Yaṭṭhālaya katisso so, tassa putto tadaccaye;
anya-e0703n0:4872_0: Hattheva rajjaṃ kāresi, tassa putto’bhayo tathā.
anya-e0703n0:4875_0: Tadaccaye tattha rajjaṃ, so akāresi khattiyo.
anya-e0703n0:4880_0: Kalyāṇiyaṃ narindo hi, tisso nāmāsi khattiyo;
anya-e0703n0:4884_0: Aññattha vasi so deso, tena taṃ nāmako ahu.
anya-e0703n0:4887_0: Pāhesi deviyā gantvā, rājadvāre ṭhito tuso.
anya-e0703n0:4892_0: Therena saddhiṃ bhuñjitvā, rañño saha viniggame;
anya-e0703n0:4898_0: Theraṃ taṃ purisaṃ tañca, mārāpetvāna kodhasā;
anya-e0703n0:4902_0: Attano dhītaraṃ yuddhaṃ, deviṃ nāma surupiniṃ.
anya-e0703n0:4914_0: Upaṭṭhahi tadā saṅghaṃ, paccayehi catūhi so.
anya-e0703n0:4920_0: Ṭhapesi tīṇi pāsāṇe, pāsāṇa phalakāni so.
anya-e0703n0:4922_0: Adā pānīya dānañca, vattaṃ saṅghassa cā’kari;
anya-e0703n0:4934_0: Tadā tatheva katvā sā, saṅghattherassa santike;
anya-e0703n0:4935_0: Nisīdi dhammaṃ desento, thero taṃ idha mabravi.
anya-e0703n0:4940_0: Evaṃ vutte tu sā āha, “kiṃ sampatti ayaṃ idha;
anya-e0703n0:4941_0: Yesaṃ no dārakā natthi, vañjhāsampatti tena no”.
anya-e0703n0:4947_0: “Patthehi mama puttattaṃ, sampattī mahatī hi no”.
anya-e0703n0:4949_0: Na icchatīti ñatvāna, tadatthaṃ mahatiṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:4953_0: Nānā bhesajja vatthāni, saṅghe datvā’tha yācitaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:4955_0: Patthesi so rājakulaṃ, sā taṃ ṭhānaṃ anekadhā;
anya-e0703n0:4959_0: Tassā kucchimhi nibbatti, taṃ jāniya nivattisā.
anya-e0703n0:4961_0: Rañño taṃ sāsanaṃ datvā, raññā saha punā’gamā;
anya-e0703n0:4967_0: Tasse’vaṃ dohaḷo āhi, mahā puññāya mātuyā;
anya-e0703n0:4980_0: Taṃ devī rājino āha, nemitte pucchi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n0:4985_0: Edisaṃ madhugaṇḍaṃ so, dasseti tassa īdisiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:4989_0: Nāvaṃ ñatvāna ācikkhi, rañño janapade naro.
anya-e0703n0:4991_0: Rājā deviṃ tahiṃ netvā, maṇḍapamhi susaṅkhate;
anya-e0703n0:4995_0: Veḷusumana nāmaṃ taṃ, yodhaṃ tattha niyojayi.
anya-e0703n0:4998_0: Gopakena akā mettiṃ, tassa kiccañca sabbadā.
anya-e0703n0:5000_0: Tassa vissattha taṃ ñatvā, pātova uppalāna’siṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5006_0: Sutvā rājā gahetuṃ taṃ, mahā yodhānapesayi;
anya-e0703n0:5015_0: Dohaḷe te ca sā devī, paribhuñji yathāruci;
anya-e0703n0:5018_0: Sā devī samaye dhaññaṃ, janayī puttamuttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5019_0: Mahārājakule tasmiṃ, ānando ca mahā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:5031_0: Kaṇḍulo iti ñāyittha, diṭṭhattā kaṇḍulena so.
anya-e0703n0:5043_0: Sabbe te uddhapattañca, cīvaraṃ pārapantu ca.
anya-e0703n0:5045_0: Paṭhamaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ pādaṃ, ummāranto ṭhapentu ca;
anya-e0703n0:5048_0: Gotamo nāma thero ca, patiggaṇhātu puttakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5049_0: So ca saraṇasikkhā yo, detu” sabbaṃ tathā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:5052_0: Datvā saṅghassa pāyāsaṃ, nāmaṃ puttassa kārayi.
anya-e0703n0:5058_0: Saṅgamaṃ deviyā kāsi, tena gabbhamagaṇhi sā.
anya-e0703n0:5060_0: Kāle jātaṃ sutaṃ rājā, tissanāmaṃ akārayi;
anya-e0703n0:5070_0: Mā jīratu kucchigataṃ, idaṃ vo”ti apāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:5082_0: Na hessāmā”ti cintetvā, bhāgaṃ bhuñjathi’manti ca.
anya-e0703n0:5087_0: Amataṃ viya bhuñjiṃsu, te dve bhāge ubhopi ca;
anya-e0703n0:5090_0: Evaṃ vuttetu tisso so, pāṇinā khipi bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5096_0: Pasāritaṅgo sayane, kiṃ nasesi sukhaṃ suta;
anya-e0703n0:5136_0: Ummārātikkame nandi, sā chajjati yato tato.
anya-e0703n0:5147_0: Damiḷānaṃ khayaṃ disvā, rañño ārocayiṃ sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5157_0: Iti gantvā gāmaṇissa, taṃ kumārassa sāvayi.
anya-e0703n0:5159_0: Mātuyā mantayitvā so, sakkāraṃ tassa kārayi;
anya-e0703n0:5160_0: Sakkato nandimitto so, yodho vasi tadantike.
anya-e0703n0:5165_0: Ahu dīghābhayo nāma, rañño’ñña bhariyā suto;
anya-e0703n0:5178_0: Rocayuṃ tassa gamanaṃ, na tu mātā pitā pana.
anya-e0703n0:5183_0: So taṃ vimaṃsanatthāya, dūre kicce niyojayi;
anya-e0703n0:5186_0: Brāhmaṇo kuṇḍalo nāma, vijja te me sahāyako;
anya-e0703n0:5189_0: Gantvā taṃ tena dinnāni, bhaṇḍakāni idhā’hara;
anya-e0703n0:5190_0: Iti vatvāna bhojetvā, lekhaṃ datvā vissajjayi.
anya-e0703n0:5193_0: Pubbaṇheyeva gantvāna, so taṃ brāhmaṇa maddasa.
anya-e0703n0:5204_0: Upāgami brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ, puṭṭho tenā’ha so gatiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5208_0: Sace jāneyya eḷāro, imaṃ hatthe karissati.
anya-e0703n0:5213_0: Eva mevaṃ likhitvāna, lekhaṃ tassa samappayi;
anya-e0703n0:5216_0: Datvā taṃ bhojayitvā ca, pesesī sakhisantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5235_0: So sabbaṃ ekato katvā, netvā mātāpitantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5239_0: Pabhāte rājaputto taṃ, sutvā tuṭṭhamano ahu.
anya-e0703n0:5264_0: Tena so laddhasakkāro, yodho vasi tadantike.
anya-e0703n0:5270_0: Karonti keḷiparihāsaṃ, tassa jeṭṭhā cha bhātaro.
anya-e0703n0:5273_0: Tassa bhāgaṃ ṭhapetvāna, gantvā tassa nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5275_0: So gantvā taṃ khaṇaṃyeva, rukkhe imbarasaññite;
anya-e0703n0:5276_0: Luñcitvāna samaṃ katvā, bhūmiṃ gantvā nivedayi.
anya-e0703n0:5278_0: Gantvāna bhātaro tassa, disvā kammanta mabbhutaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5291_0: Kīḷamāno khipi tadā, so kīḷāguḷake viya.
anya-e0703n0:5333_0: Gantvā ubho sakaṃ nāmaṃ, dārakassa akārayuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5334_0: Taṃ vuddhaṃ attano gehe, vāsesi siribhojako.
anya-e0703n0:5336_0: Tasse’ko sindhavo posaṃ, kañcinā rohituṃ adā;
anya-e0703n0:5337_0: Disvā tu veḷusumanaṃ, ayaṃ arohako mama.
anya-e0703n0:5344_0: So assaṃ āruhitvā taṃ, sīghaṃ dhāvayi maṇḍale;
anya-e0703n0:5345_0: Maṇḍale sakale asso, ekābaddho adissi so.
anya-e0703n0:5350_0: Taṃ disvā parisā sabbā, ukkuṭṭhiṃ sampavattayi;
anya-e0703n0:5360_0: Īsakaṃ pana khañjattā, khañjadevoti taṃ viduṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5362_0: Migamaṃ gāmavāsīhi, saha gantvāna so tadā;
anya-e0703n0:5366_0: Asumha bhūmiṃ cuṇṇeti, tesaṃ aṭṭhīni māṇavo.
anya-e0703n0:5374_0: Gantvā saha kumārehi, vihāraṃ so kumārako;
anya-e0703n0:5378_0: Ummattā viya āsuṃ te, bhītā sabbepi dārakā.
anya-e0703n0:5380_0: Tena so āsi ummāda-phussa devoti pākaṭo;
anya-e0703n0:5383_0: Saddavedhi vijjuvedhī, vālavedhī ca so ahu;
anya-e0703n0:5390_0: Thale aṭṭhusabhaṃ yāti, jale tu usabhaṃ pana.
anya-e0703n0:5405_0: Vahanto paṃsupiṇḍe so, lahuṃ vāpiṃ samāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:5407_0: Tena so pākaṭo āsi, tampi ādāya bhūmipo;
anya-e0703n0:5408_0: Datvā taṃ tassa sakkāraṃ, gāmaṇissa adāsi taṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5425_0: Tathā tepā’nayuṃ yodhe, sabbe sampiṇḍitā tu te;
anya-e0703n0:5453_0: Pitā me puriso honto, ne’vaṃ vakkhati teni’daṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5457_0: Tāya taṃ bandhayissāmi, nā’ññathā rakkhiyo hi so.
anya-e0703n0:5469_0: Sabbe yodhe samānetvā, kāresi sapathaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n0:5472_0: Akaṃsu sapathaṃ sabbe, taṃ yuddhaṃ tena nāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5478_0: Netvā tissa mahārāmaṃ, taṃ saṅghassa nivedayi.
anya-e0703n0:5502_0: Taṃ disvā “bhikkhusaṅghassa, kammaṃ” iti nivatti so.
anya-e0703n0:5515_0: Thero piyaṅgu dīpaṭṭho, theraṃ tattha niyojayi;
anya-e0703n0:5519_0: Saṅghassa bhāgaṃ sambhāgaṃ, rājā patte khipāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:5521_0: Sambhāgaṃ khipi tisso ca, sambhāgaṃ vaḷavāpi ca;
anya-e0703n0:5525_0: Adā gotamatherassa, so gantvā nabhasā lahuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5528_0: Pañcasatānaṃ so thero, laddhehi tu tadantikā.
anya-e0703n0:5530_0: Bhāgehi pattaṃ pūretvā, ākāse khipi rājino;
anya-e0703n0:5531_0: Disvā’ gataṃ gahetvā taṃ, tisso bhojisi bhūpatiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5534_0: Sattāhaṃ cumbaṭaṃ katvā, rājā pattaṃ visajjayi.
anya-e0703n0:5536_0: Gantvāna so mahāgāmaṃ, samādāya balaṃ puna;
anya-e0703n0:5540_0: Dve bhātaro samāgañchuṃ, yujjhamānā raṇe tadā.
anya-e0703n0:5543_0: Tathāpi chiddaṃ no disvā, laṅghā petuṃ matiṃakā.
anya-e0703n0:5546_0: Tomaraṃ khipi cammaṃva, yathā chijjati piṭṭhiyaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5549_0: Patiṃsu yuddhe yujjhantā, bhijja ceva mahabbalaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5563_0: “Mañce tattha mahārāja”, iti thero avoca taṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5564_0: Heṭṭhā mañceti jānitvā, tato nikkhamma bhūpati.
anya-e0703n0:5566_0: Samantato vihārassa, rakkhaṃ kārayi taṃ pana;
anya-e0703n0:5572_0: Nīyamānantu taṃ ñatvā, idha māha mahīpati;
anya-e0703n0:5584_0: Nikkhāmito so bhikkhūhi, tissorāja suto pana;
anya-e0703n0:5607_0: Janakkhayaṃ vināyeva, kalaho na bhaveyya no;
anya-e0703n0:5608_0: Rājā saṅghassa doseso, bhaṃghe daṇḍaṃ karissati.
anya-e0703n0:5638_0: Maṅgalañceva rakkhā ca, bhikkhūnaṃ dassanaṃ hino.
anya-e0703n0:5653_0: Yujjhaṃ catūhi mā sehi, katahatthaṃ mahabbalaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5671_0: Gaṇhi khāṇuṃ khāṇugāme, dve tu tambuṇṇame pana.
anya-e0703n0:5674_0: Jambucaggahī soso ca, gāmo’hu taṃ tadavhayo.
anya-e0703n0:5697_0: Hatthinā nandimitto tu, yasmā yattha ayujjhi so;
anya-e0703n0:5698_0: Tasmā tattha tato gāmo, hatthiporoti vuccati.
anya-e0703n0:5700_0: Vīmaṃsitvā ubho rājā, vijitaṃ nagaraṃ agā;
anya-e0703n0:5706_0: Dvāraṃ thakesuṃ damiḷā, rājā yodhe visajjayi;
anya-e0703n0:5707_0: Kaṇṇulo nandimitto ca, suranimilo ca dakkhiṇe.
anya-e0703n0:5726_0: Na idaṃ surāpāṇaṃ te, ayodvāra vighāṭanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5729_0: So mānaṃ janayitvāna, koñcaṃ katvā gajuttamo;
anya-e0703n0:5733_0: Rājā āruyha hatthiṃ taṃ, kumbhe phusiyapāṇinā.
anya-e0703n0:5745_0: Saddhārabāhaṃ taṃ dvāraṃ, bhūmiyaṃ saravaṃ pati.
anya-e0703n0:5760_0: Oloki suranimalaṃ, anicchaṃ sopi taṃ pathaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5771_0: Visuṃ visuṃ vīthigatā, damiḷe tattha cuṇṇayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5774_0: Tatho girilakaṃ gantvā, giriyaṃ damiḷaṃ hani.
anya-e0703n0:5797_0: “Suve yuddhaṃ karissāmi”, iti te nicchayaṃ karuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5803_0: Abbhantare koṭṭhake tu, sayaṃ aṭṭhāsi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n0:5823_0: “Chindā metaṃ saphalakaṃ”, iti cintiya so pana;
anya-e0703n0:5824_0: Phalakaṃ hani khaggena, taṃ muñciyi’ tarosayi.
anya-e0703n0:5829_0: Saṅkhaṃ dhami phussadevo, senā bhijjittha dāmiḷi;
anya-e0703n0:5832_0: Tattha vāpi jalaṃ āsi, hatānaṃ lohitā vilaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5833_0: Tasmā kulatthavā pīti, nāmato vissutaṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n0:5844_0: Vijjhāpesi ca dantehi, taṃ hatthiṃ sakahatthinā;
anya-e0703n0:5845_0: Tomaraṃ khipi eḷāraṃ, sahatthi tattha so pati.
anya-e0703n0:5848_0: Laṃkaṃ ekātapattaṃ so, katvāna pāvisi puraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5850_0: Puramhi bheriṃ cāretvā, samantā yojane jane;
anya-e0703n0:5862_0: Vijite nagare bhinne, yodho so dīghajattuko;
anya-e0703n0:5871_0: Otiṇṇo so suṇitvāpi, patanaṃ tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n0:5878_0: Hatthassa rathayo dhehi, pantīhi ca anunako.
anya-e0703n0:5883_0: Pavatte tumūle yuddhe, sannaddho bhalluko tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5887_0: Senāpi saddhiṃ teneva, paccosakki saniṃ saniṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5890_0: Na paccosakki kiṃ etaṃ, phussadevā”ti āha so.
anya-e0703n0:5892_0: Jayo no paramo deva, jayabhūmi mayaṃ gajo;
anya-e0703n0:5901_0: Mukhaṃ pidhāya khaggena, rājā akkosi taṃ pana;
anya-e0703n0:5902_0: “Rañño mukhamhi pātemi”, iti kaṇḍañca so khipi.
anya-e0703n0:5904_0: Āhacca so khaggatalaṃ, kaṇḍo papati bhūmiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5907_0: Rañño pacchā nisinno bho, phussadevo mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n0:5910_0: Rājānaṃ pādato katvā, patamānassa tassa tu;
anya-e0703n0:5911_0: Khipitvā aparaṃ kaṇḍaṃ, vijjhitvā tassa jaṇḍukaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5917_0: Kaṇḍavalliṃ sakaṃ chetvā, pasataṃ lohitaṃ sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:5919_0: Radhaññā dassesi taṃ disvā, rājā taṃ pucchi“kiṃ”iti;
anya-e0703n0:5920_0: Rāja daṇḍo kato meti, so avoca mahīpati.
anya-e0703n0:5927_0: Iti vatvā mahārājā, kataññu idha māha ca;
anya-e0703n0:5930_0: Ghātetvā damiḷe sabbe, rājā laddhajayo kato;
anya-e0703n0:5946_0: Kataṃ akkhobhiṇighātaṃ, saranto na sukhaṃ labhi.
anya-e0703n0:5951_0: Āgamma te majjhāyāme, rāja dvāramhi otaruṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5958_0: Tamassā sayituṃ amhe, iti rājā punā’hate.
anya-e0703n0:5960_0: “Kathaṃ nu bhante assāso, mama hessati yena me;
anya-e0703n0:5973_0: Vanditvā te visajjetvā, sayito puna cintayi.
anya-e0703n0:5978_0: Adatvā bhikkhusaṅghassa, bhuttaṃ atthi nukho iti;
anya-e0703n0:5982_0: Tadatthaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ me, kattabbanti ca cintayi.
anya-e0703n0:5984_0: Ete tenekakoṭi idha manujagaṇe ghātite cintayitvā,
anya-e0703n0:5985_0: Kāmānaṃ hetu etaṃ manasi ca kayirā sādhu ādīnavaṃ taṃ;
anya-e0703n0:5986_0: Sabbesaṃ ghātaniṃ taṃ manasi ca kayirā’ niccataṃ sādhu sādhu,
anya-e0703n0:5987_0: Evaṃ dukkhā pamokkhaṃ subhagati mahavā pāpuṇeyyā’cīrenāti.
anya-e0703n0:6003_0: Icceva māha taṃ rājā, punappunaṃ nisedhayi;
anya-e0703n0:6010_0: Rājā katā bhisekova, mahatā vibhavena so.
anya-e0703n0:6024_0: Cāletuṃ taṃ na sakkhiṃsu, kuntaṃ rājādhikārikā;
anya-e0703n0:6027_0: Rājā mahantaṃ accheraṃ, disvā taṃ haṭṭhamānaso;
anya-e0703n0:6028_0: Vidhāya tattha ārakkhaṃ, pavisitvā puraṃ tato.
anya-e0703n0:6033_0: Tīhi vassehi niṭhāsi, vihāro so narissaro;
anya-e0703n0:6045_0: Patiggaṇhātu taṃ saṅgho, iti so dakkhiṇodakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6048_0: Vihāre taṃ samantāpi, mahantaṃ maṇḍapaṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6060_0: Ante sahassagghanako, sabba saṅgho ca taṃlabhi.
anya-e0703n0:6062_0: Yuddhe dāne ca sūrena, sūrinā ratanattaye;
anya-e0703n0:6081_0: Tato rājā vicintesi, vissutaṃ sussutaṃ sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6108_0: Dibbaṃ vimānaṃ pesetvā, tadā lekhaṃ adātha me”;
anya-e0703n0:6114_0: Bharaṇiṃ nāma dāsiṃ so, “niccaṃ dehī”ti abravi;
anya-e0703n0:6115_0: Datvā sā tāni sakkaccaṃ, yāvajīvaṃ tato cutā.
anya-e0703n0:6132_0: Tāvatiṃsañca gacchantā, disvā theraṃ tameva te;
anya-e0703n0:6133_0: Hiṅgulena tadā lekhaṃ, lekhayitvā paṭe tato.
anya-e0703n0:6136_0: Saṅgho paṭaṃ gahetvā taṃ, pāhesi rājasantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:6138_0: Taṃ disvā sumano rājā, āgammārāma muttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6162_0: Sahassaṃ tattha pāsādo, gabbhā āsuṃ susaṅkhatā;
anya-e0703n0:6178_0: Sajjhumaye candimā ca, tārā ca muttakā mayā.
anya-e0703n0:6198_0: Ācāma kumbhisovaṇṇā, uluṅko ca ahu tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6199_0: Pāsāda paribhogesu, sesesu ca kathā’ vakā.
anya-e0703n0:6218_0: Arahanto ca aṭṭhaṃsu, uddhaṃ catūsu bhūmisu.
anya-e0703n0:6243_0: Āruyha rattiṃ bhuñjitvā, sayito iti cintayi.
anya-e0703n0:6246_0: Na sakkā balimuddhattuṃ, taṃ vajjiya baliṃ ahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:6252_0: Devesu ñatvā taṃ sakko, vissakammāna mabravi.
anya-e0703n0:6255_0: Gantvā purā yojanamhi, gambhīra nadī yantike.
anya-e0703n0:6257_0: Māpehi iṭṭhikā tattaṃ’, iti sakke na bhāsito;
anya-e0703n0:6260_0: Pabhāte luddako tattha, sunakhehi vanaṃ agā;
anya-e0703n0:6264_0: Antarahitāya godhāya, iti cidhantasi so tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:6269_0: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, piyaṃ janahi tappiyo;
anya-e0703n0:6278_0: Suvaṇṇa puṇṇaṃ taṃ bhūmiṃ, disvā saṅgāmavāsikā;
anya-e0703n0:6279_0: Suvaṇṇa pāhiṃ ādāya, gantvā rañño nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:6296_0: Nagare vāṇijo eko, ādāya sakaṭe bahū;
anya-e0703n0:6302_0: Cāṭippamāṇa taṃ tattha, pakkabhārena nāmi taṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6303_0: Disvā pana salaṭṭhiñca, pāsāṇaṭṭhañca taṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:6305_0: Vaṇṭe taṃ vāsiyā chetvā, dassāma’gganti cintiya;
anya-e0703n0:6311_0: Muñjitvā’vāṭa puṇṇaṃ taṃ, yūsaṃ pattehī ādiya;
anya-e0703n0:6319_0: Tesaṃ patte gahetvā so, pattāmiñjahi pūriya;
anya-e0703n0:6320_0: Adāsi tesaṃ pakkāmuṃ, tayo eko napakkami.
anya-e0703n0:6322_0: Rajataṃ tassa dassetuṃ, orohitvā tato hi so;
anya-e0703n0:6328_0: Añjasā iminā tvampi, gaccha dānī upāsaka;
anya-e0703n0:6329_0: Gantvāna theraṃ passitvā, veyyāvacca mahāsi ca.
anya-e0703n0:6331_0: Thero ca leṇadvārena, tassa magga amāpayi;
anya-e0703n0:6332_0: Theraṃ vandiya so tena, gacchanto leṇamaddasa.
anya-e0703n0:6334_0: Leṇa dvāramhi ṭhatvāna, passitvā rajatampi so;
anya-e0703n0:6347_0: Kevaṭṭā tā samekkhitvā, rāsiṃ katvāna ekato.
anya-e0703n0:6352_0: Purato uttare passe, satta yojana matthake;
anya-e0703n0:6358_0: Te disvā sunakho luddo, agantvā rājasantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6365_0: Ete vā rakkhake katvā, sabbāni āharāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:6390_0: Mattikā sukhumā tattha, samantā tiṃ sayojane.
anya-e0703n0:6420_0: Patiṭṭhāpessaṃ sve ettha, sabbo saṅgho sametuno.
anya-e0703n0:6426_0: Cetiya ṭhāna bhūsāya, amacce ca niyojayi.
anya-e0703n0:6435_0: Nahāpite nahāpake ca, appake ca bahūtathā.
anya-e0703n0:6437_0: Vatthāni gandhamālā ca, annāni madhurāni ca;
anya-e0703n0:6464_0: Thero’ sīti sahassāni, bhikkhū ādāya āgamā;
anya-e0703n0:6488_0: Cattārīsata sahassāni, sahassāni ca saṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0703n0:6492_0: Thero tiṃsa sahassāni, bhikkhū ādāya āgamā.
anya-e0703n0:6513_0: Majjhe ṭhapetvā okāsaṃ, rañño aṭṭhaṃsu bhikkhavo.
anya-e0703n0:6515_0: Pavisitvā tahiṃ rājā, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ tathā ṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6537_0: Iti so nāgataṃ passaṃ, mahantattaṃ nivārayi.
anya-e0703n0:6549_0: Aṭṭhuttare aṭṭhuttare, vatthānaṃ tu sate pana.
anya-e0703n0:6567_0: Vanditvā pūjayitvā ca, suppatito kamena so.
anya-e0703n0:6597_0: Saṅgho taṃ nādhivāsesi, anupubbena so pana;
anya-e0703n0:6604_0: Satthāhaṃ tattha saṅghassa, tato saṅghaṃ vissajjayi.
anya-e0703n0:6606_0: Tato bheriṃ carāpetvā, iṭṭhakā vaḍḍhakī lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6609_0: Kathaṃ karissasi ne’ko, pucchito āha bhūpati;
anya-e0703n0:6613_0: Tato upaḍḍhupaḍḍhañca, paṃsū dve ammaṇāni ca.
anya-e0703n0:6615_0: Āhaṃsu rājā paṭibāhi, caturo tepi vaḍḍhakī;
anya-e0703n0:6616_0: Atheko paṇḍito byatto, vaḍḍhakī āha bhūpatiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:6624_0: “Kaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ cetiyaṃ taṃ, karissasi tuvaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n0:6637_0: Iti rājā vicintesi, rattiṃñatvāna taṃ marū.
anya-e0703n0:6661_0: Kamena rājā sutvāna, āgato pucchi vaḍḍhakī.
anya-e0703n0:6664_0: Ekena mattikāpiṇḍaṃ, denti mayhaṃ ahaṃ pana.
anya-e0703n0:6666_0: Ayaṃ āgantuko bhikkhu, ayaṃ nevāsiko iti;
anya-e0703n0:6670_0: So balatassa dassesi, so taṃ rañño nivedayi.
anya-e0703n0:6676_0: Balattho taṃ nivedesi, tadā taṃ jāni so yati.
anya-e0703n0:6685_0: So taṃ tattha niyojesi, kolāhalamahosi ca.
anya-e0703n0:6687_0: Rājā sutvāva’ taṃ āha, “ñātuṃ sakkā tamiṭṭhikaṃ”;
anya-e0703n0:6688_0: Jānantopi na sakkāti, rājānaṃ āha vaḍḍhakī.
anya-e0703n0:6701_0: Rañño sabbaṃ nivedesi, rājā tassa adāpayi;
anya-e0703n0:6707_0: Therena saha gantvā so, dissante piyagallake;
anya-e0703n0:6713_0: Kulūpagassa therassa, gahitā me ime mayā;
anya-e0703n0:6714_0: Vatthayugaṃtu puttassa, sabbe tāni dadāmi vo.
anya-e0703n0:6716_0: Iti vatvāna datvā te, gahetvā gacchato pana;
anya-e0703n0:6725_0: Ettheva bhatiyā kammaṃ, karitvā itthiyo duve;
anya-e0703n0:6745_0: Mahāthūpe kataṃ kammaṃ, tassa āhaṃsu devatā;
anya-e0703n0:6746_0: Evaṃ tathāgate heva, pasādo hi mahapphalo.
anya-e0703n0:6751_0: Nava vāre citaṃ sabbaṃ, evaṃ osīdayiṃsu te;
anya-e0703n0:6760_0: Kataṃ etaṃ mahārāja, na idāni karissate;
anya-e0703n0:6769_0: Āharathā”ti yojesi, te gantvā uttaraṃ kuruṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6784_0: Aṭṭhārasa rataniko, khandho sākhāssa pañca ca;
anya-e0703n0:6790_0: Atha maṅgalikā tassa, khandhe pupphalatāpi ca;
anya-e0703n0:6794_0: Suvaṇṇa ghaṇṭāpantīdha, dāmāni ca tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:6854_0: Dahanaṃ agginibbānaṃ, tattha sakkāra meva ca.
anya-e0703n0:6862_0: Catuddisaṃ te cattāro, mahārājā ṭhitā ahuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6863_0: Tettiṃsadeva puttā ca, bāttiṃsa ca kumāriyo.
anya-e0703n0:6871_0: Padumādigāhakā devā, aññe devā ca nekadhā;
anya-e0703n0:6872_0: Ratanagghiya panti ca, dhammacakkāna meva ca.
anya-e0703n0:6896_0: Dhātu tassa vicuṇṇitaṃ janahitaṃ āsiṃsatā pūjiya;
anya-e0703n0:6898_0: Tiṭṭhantaṃ sugataṃ viya’ssa munino dhātu ca sambūjaye.
anya-e0703n0:6908_0: Dhātugabbhamhi kammāni, mayā niṭṭhāpi tāni hi;
anya-e0703n0:6909_0: Suve dhātuṃ nidhessāmi, bhante jānātha dhātuyo”.
anya-e0703n0:6911_0: Idaṃ vatvā mahārājā, nagaraṃ pāvisī tato;
anya-e0703n0:6929_0: Taṃ pāpuṇitvā gaṅgāya, jalaṃ pakkhili taṃ idha;
anya-e0703n0:6930_0: Bhikkhū asaddahantā taṃ, satthuno taṃ nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:6938_0: Idhā’netvā dassayitvā, janassa puna taṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6942_0: Ussāpetvāna dassetvā, janassa khipi taṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:6947_0: Iti patthayi tenetaṃ, saṅgho soṇuttaraṃ yatiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:6951_0: Kathesi saṅgho therassa, tassa tā dhātuyo iti.
anya-e0703n0:6957_0: Ekaṃ doṇaṃ rāmagāme, koḷiyehi ca sakkataṃ.

anya-e0703n0:7052_0: Taṃ sutvā nāgarājāso, atīva domanassi to;
