anya-e0703n0:7101_0: Gahetvā yāhi taṃ thero, tikkhattuṃ taṃ bhaṇāpiya.
anya-e0703n0:7118_0: Bhikkhu nāgassa vijaye, tuṭṭhā devā samāgatā;
anya-e0703n0:7125_0: Te tena tuṭṭhā gantvāna, pūjā bhaṇḍāni āharuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7128_0: Ādāya saha devehi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ samupāgato.
anya-e0703n0:7160_0: Mātūnaṃ purato ceva, tattha tattha ca pañcasu;
anya-e0703n0:7167_0: Dhātuṃ pūjīya vanditvā, ṭhito pañcalīko tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7196_0: Sayaṃ karaṇḍo vivari, uggantvā dhātuyo tato;
anya-e0703n0:7208_0: Tato oruyha caṅkoṭo, rañño sīse patiṭṭhahi;
anya-e0703n0:7221_0: Janassa saraṇaṃ hutvā, yadi ṭhassanti dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n0:7226_0: Iti cintiya so dhātū, ṭhapesi sayanuttame;
anya-e0703n0:7227_0: Tadā kārā dhātuyo ca, sahiṃsu sayanuttame.
anya-e0703n0:7236_0: Laṃkāya rajjaṃ sakalaṃ, sattāhāni adāsi ca.
anya-e0703n0:7251_0: Yathā sakaṃ gharaṃ yantu”, taṃ yathādhiṭṭhitaṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n0:7259_0: Saṅgho te dve sāmaṇere, tasmiṃ kamme niyojayi;
anya-e0703n0:7263_0: Mā nibbāyantu dīpāva, mā kiñcāpi vivajjatu.
anya-e0703n0:7321_0: Yo so na paccudāvatto, mahāyodho vasī mama.
anya-e0703n0:7324_0: Idāni so maṃ no peti, thero theraputtabhayo.
anya-e0703n0:7326_0: Iti cintayi sothero, jānitvā tassa cintitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:7332_0: Rājā disvā pasanno taṃ, purato ca nisīdiya;
anya-e0703n0:7336_0: Maccusattuṃ parājetuṃ, na sakkomī”ti āha ca.
anya-e0703n0:7348_0: Upaṭṭhite devaloke, hitvā dibbaṃ sukhaṃ tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7350_0: Idhāgamma bahuṃ puññaṃ, akāsi ca anekadhā;
anya-e0703n0:7359_0: Tadā ca āharāpetvā, pahaṭṭho puñña potthakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:7360_0: Vācetuṃ lekhakaṃ āha, so taṃ vācesi potthakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7406_0: Ghate pakke mahājāla, pūve ṭhānamhi tattake;
anya-e0703n0:7407_0: Tatheva saha bhattehi, nicca emava adāpayiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7409_0: Uposathesu divasesu, māse māse ca aṭṭhasu;
anya-e0703n0:7428_0: Dinna dāna dvayaṃyeva, taṃ me hāsesi mānasaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7430_0: Taṃ sutvā abhayo thero, taṃ dānadvayameva so;
anya-e0703n0:7436_0: Navannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ, datvā taṃ paribhuñji so;
anya-e0703n0:7437_0: Pathavīcālako dhamma, suttathero tu taṃ pana.
anya-e0703n0:7455_0: Rājā cittaṃ pasādetvā, taṃ theraṃ idha mabruvi.
anya-e0703n0:7458_0: Aha mevaṃ hotu kāyo’pi, saṅghassa upakārako.
anya-e0703n0:7464_0: Niṭṭhāpehi tuvaṃ sabbaṃ, kammaṃ sakkacca sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7466_0: Sāyaṃ pāto ca pupphāni, mahāthūpamhi pūjaya;
anya-e0703n0:7469_0: Paṭiyāditañca yaṃ vattaṃ, mayā sugata sāsane;
anya-e0703n0:7470_0: Sabbaṃ aparihāpetvā, tāta vattaya taṃ tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7472_0: Saṅghassa tāta kiccesu, mā pamajjittha sabbadā”;
anya-e0703n0:7473_0: Itaṃ taṃ anusāsitvā, tuṇhī āsi mahīpati.
anya-e0703n0:7476_0: Devatā cha rathe ceva, chahi devehi ānayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7478_0: Yācuṃ visuṃ visuṃ devā, rājānaṃ te rathe ṭhitā;
anya-e0703n0:7481_0: Rājā tesaṃ vaco sutvā, “yāva dhammaṃ suṇomahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:7488_0: Rājā “netaṃ tathā bhante”, iti vatvāna taṃ vadi.
anya-e0703n0:7490_0: Taṃ sutvāna janā keci, “bhīto maccubhayā ayaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:7497_0: Tāni laggāni lambiṃsu, rathīsāsu visuṃ visuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7508_0: Metteyyo bodhisatto hi, vasate tusite pure.
anya-e0703n0:7520_0: Katvāna thūpaṃ saṅghañca, vanditvā tusitaṃ agā.
anya-e0703n0:7529_0: So eva māḷako ettha, vuccate “rāja māḷako”.
anya-e0703n0:7546_0: So saggaṃ sakale rami vo payāti tasmā,
anya-e0703n0:7557_0: Atīva dhañño so āsi, puññakammarato sadā;
anya-e0703n0:7590_0: Evaṃ puññāni katvā so, anekāni mahīpati;
anya-e0703n0:7665_0: Tiyo nāma brāhmaṇassa, vaco sutvā apaṇḍito;
anya-e0703n0:7666_0: Coro asu mahātassa, parivāro ahosi ca.
anya-e0703n0:7674_0: “Rajjaṃ tava idāneva, gaṇha tvaṃ damiḷe” iti;
anya-e0703n0:7675_0: Sādhūti so damiḷehi, yujjhi gaṇhiṃsu te tu taṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7677_0: Tato te damiḷā yuddhaṃ, raññā saha pavattayuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:7682_0: Vāsito ca tadā āsi, ekavīsati rājusū.
anya-e0703n0:7688_0: Vihāraṃ ettha kāressaṃ”, iccevaṃ cintayī tadā.
anya-e0703n0:7699_0: Asakkuṇitvā gāhetuṃ, pattaṃ bhuttaṃ jinena taṃ;
anya-e0703n0:7726_0: Puḷahatthaṃ gahetvā taṃ, dūre vassāni bāhīyo;
anya-e0703n0:7735_0: Pīḷayamāraṃ gahetvā so, dāṭhiyo damiḷo pana;
anya-e0703n0:7747_0: Deviyā vacanaṃ sutvā, tassa āgamanā purā;
anya-e0703n0:7750_0: Dhanuṃ sandhāya āyantaṃ, sīvaṃ vijjhi mahāsīvo;
anya-e0703n0:7780_0: Damiḷehi vā’tha raññā, iti puṭṭhā tu te pana.
anya-e0703n0:7783_0: Ubho tissa mahātissa-therā ādāya te tato.
anya-e0703n0:7786_0: Rājā ca te amaccā ca, thero eva mayācayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7788_0: Siddhe kamme pesiteno, gantabbaṃ santikaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n0:7804_0: Taṃ mahātissa therassa, vihāraṃ mānado adā.
anya-e0703n0:7806_0: Girissa yasmā gārāme, rājā kāresi sobhayo;
anya-e0703n0:7814_0: Rathā oropitā sā hi, tasmiṃṭhāne varaṅganā;
anya-e0703n0:7818_0: Rājā tassa vaco sutvā, vihāraṃ tattha kārayi.
anya-e0703n0:7825_0: Tesu sattasu yodhesu, uttiyo nāma kārayi;
anya-e0703n0:7829_0: Amacco kārayī tena, sopi taṃnāmako ahu.
anya-e0703n0:7838_0: Vihāre dema tumhākaṃ, iti vatvā adaṃsu ca.
anya-e0703n0:7840_0: Thero sabbatthavāsesi, te te bhikkhū yathā rahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:7844_0: Paccayehi anunehi, tena te bahavo ahuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7847_0: Kulasaṃsaṭṭha dosena, saṅgho taṃ nīhari ito.
anya-e0703n0:7858_0: Evaṃ te theravādīhi, pabhinnā bhikkhavo dvidhā.
anya-e0703n0:7869_0: Hāniṃ disvāna sattānaṃ, tadā bhikkhū samāgatā;
anya-e0703n0:7886_0: Rajjaṃ cuddasavassāni, dhammena ca samena ca.
anya-e0703n0:7888_0: Sahatthena kataṃ dānaṃ, so sutvāna mahapphalaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:7897_0: Te guḷe āharāpetvā, puraṃ āgamma bhūpati;
anya-e0703n0:7912_0: Evaṃ saddhāya so rājā, katvā puññāninekadhā;
anya-e0703n0:7939_0: Rattā vīsena taṃ hantvā, vaṭuke rajjamappayi;
anya-e0703n0:7940_0: Vaṭuko damiḷo so hi, pure nagaravaḍḍhakī.
anya-e0703n0:7943_0: Rajjaṃ kāresi nagare, anulā tattha āgataṃ.
anya-e0703n0:7946_0: Hantvā visena vaṭukaṃ, tassa rajjaṃ samappayi.
anya-e0703n0:7958_0: Taṃ mahesiṃ karitvāna, niccaṃ tāya upaṭṭhito.
anya-e0703n0:7991_0: Kāresi dantagehanti, vissato āsi tena so.
anya-e0703n0:8033_0: Therā dvāraṃ māpayitvā, dhātugabbhaṃ nayiṃsu taṃ.
anya-e0703n0:8051_0: Tatheva paṭṭavaṭṭīnaṃ, su bahūhi sikhāhi ca.
anya-e0703n0:8098_0: Cajitvāna sakaṃ pāṇaṃ, nipajjitvā sayaṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:8111_0: Dhajagghika to raṇāni, maṇḍayitvā tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:8125_0: Cetiyassa mahetena, pūjā sā kāritā subhā;
anya-e0703n0:8140_0: Attānaṃ deviṃputte dve, hatthiṃ assañca maṅgalaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:8162_0: Tuṭṭho vihāraṃ dāpesi, saṅghe bhogaṃ tatheva so.
anya-e0703n0:8199_0: Tīṇi vassāni nagare, rajjaṃ kāresi khattiyo.
anya-e0703n0:8222_0: Tahiṃ adisvā te rājā, kuddho tehi akārayi;
anya-e0703n0:8225_0: Tesaṃ vicārake katvā, caṇḍāle ca ṭhapāpayi;
anya-e0703n0:8228_0: Rājānaṃ taṃ gahetvāna, rundhitvāna sake ghare;
anya-e0703n0:8229_0: Sayaṃ rajjaṃ vicāresuṃ, rañño devī tadā sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:8234_0: Pesesi vatvā sandesaṃ, netvā taṃ dhātiyo tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:8245_0: Dukkhito so ruditvāna, nāgo bhetvāna āḷakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:8251_0: Nāvaṃ āro payitvāna, rājānaṃ tattha kuñjaro;
anya-e0703n0:8272_0: So gahetvā balaṃ rājā, yuddhāya abhinikkhami;
anya-e0703n0:8273_0: Taṃ sutvā lambakaṇṇā ca, yuddhāya abhisaṃyutā.
anya-e0703n0:8279_0: Rājā nāmaṃ sāvayitvā, sayaṃ pāvisi tena so.
anya-e0703n0:8299_0: Goṇā eterathe yuttā, tava honti rathesabha;
anya-e0703n0:8317_0: Tassa rañño mahesī ca, saṅgāme pattimattano;
anya-e0703n0:8320_0: Taṃ tissavāpī kīḷāya, hantvā candamukhaṃ sivaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:8329_0: Subhaṃ balatthaṃ taṃ rājā, rājabhūsāya bhūsiya;
anya-e0703n0:8333_0: Yaṭṭhiṃ gahetvā hatthena, dvāramūle ṭhito sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:8336_0: Rājā hasati evaṃ so, kurute antarantarā.
anya-e0703n0:8339_0: Ayaṃ balattho kasmā me, sammukhāhasatī”ti so.
anya-e0703n0:8341_0: Mārāpayitvā rājānaṃ, balattho so subho idha;
anya-e0703n0:8366_0: Vatvā rahassaṃ datvā ca, sahassaṃ taṃ palāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:8371_0: Tato paraṃ kuṭṭhino ca, rājabhāvāya nicchitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:8378_0: So rājā dvīhi vassehi, āgamma purasantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:8380_0: Subharājaṃ raṇe hantvā, vasabho so mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n0:8390_0: Saṅghaṃ so sannipātetvā, vanditvā pucchi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n0:8402_0: Rājā sādhūti gantvāna, tathā sabbaṃ makāsi so.
anya-e0703n0:8443_0: Tassa rañño mahesī sā, vuttanāmā manoramaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:8467_0: Pure bahū pokkharaṇī, kārāpetvā tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:8483_0: Sakammaṃ karato tassa, bhattaṃ āhari dārikā.
anya-e0703n0:8486_0: Sattame divase disvā, bhattaṃ medhāvīnī adā.
anya-e0703n0:8495_0: Sareyyāsī’ti thero tu, tadā ca parinibbuto.
anya-e0703n0:8497_0: Sake so vasabho rājā, vayappattamhi puttake;
anya-e0703n0:8507_0: Rājā tuṭṭho sutassā’dā, taṃ sādhu katamaṅgalaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:8515_0: Mahāmattā tu devī sā, sarantī therabhāsitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:8624_0: Kuḍḍanāgassa rañño tu, devīyā bhātuko tadā;
anya-e0703n0:8645_0: Ṭhapesi so hi vohāraṃ, hiṃsā muttaṃ yatoidha;
anya-e0703n0:8646_0: Vohāraka tissarājā, iti nāmaṃ tato ahu.
anya-e0703n0:8658_0: Māse māse sahassaṃ so, mahāvihārassa dāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:8676_0: Dāna vaṭṭaṃ ṭhapāpesi, saddhamme gāravena so.
anya-e0703n0:8681_0: Mahā vesākha pūjaṃ so, kāretvā dīpavāsinaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:8688_0: Deviyā tassa saṃsaṭṭho, ñāto bhīto sabhātarā.
anya-e0703n0:8700_0: Abhayo taṃ jānanatthaṃ, dūtaṃ idha visajjayi.
anya-e0703n0:8702_0: Taṃ disvā pūgarukkhaṃ so, samantā kuntanāḷiyā;
anya-e0703n0:8706_0: Dūto gantvā abhayassa, taṃ pavattiṃ pavedayi.
anya-e0703n0:8708_0: Ñatvā’bhayo taṃ damiḷe, ādāya basuke tato;
anya-e0703n0:8742_0: Taṃ sutvā abhayo pacchā, yanto pucchi punāhaso.
anya-e0703n0:8749_0: Te puraṃ pavisitvāna, tayo rañño’ti vallabho;
anya-e0703n0:8777_0: Visaṃ phalesu yo jesuṃ, rājabhojjāya jambuyā.
anya-e0703n0:8779_0: Khāditvā jambupakkāni, tāni tattheva so mato;
anya-e0703n0:8789_0: Nipajji bhūmiyaṃ rājā, katvāna iti nicchayaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:8794_0: Evaṃ nipanne bhūminde, devo pāvassi tāvade;
anya-e0703n0:8800_0: Tato jalamhi pilavaṃ, rājā vuṭṭhāsi dhammiko;
anya-e0703n0:8803_0: Corātahiṃ tahiṃ jātā, iti sutvāna bhūpati;
anya-e0703n0:8809_0: Eko yakkho idhāgamma, rattakkho iti vissuto;
anya-e0703n0:8818_0: “Apassitvāna taṃ yakkhaṃ, na cuṭṭhāmī”ti so sayi;
anya-e0703n0:8819_0: Tassa so dhammatejena, agā yakkho tadantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:8822_0: “Kasmā pajaṃ me bhakkhesi, mā khāda”iti sobravi.
anya-e0703n0:8825_0: “Na sakkā iti vutte so, kamenekaṃti abravi.
anya-e0703n0:8827_0: “Aññaṃ na sakkā dātuṃ me, maṃ khāda” iti sobravi;
anya-e0703n0:8828_0: “Na sakkā”iti taṃ yāci, gāme gāme baliñca so.
anya-e0703n0:8830_0: Sādhūti vatvā bhūmindo, dipampi sakalepi ca;
anya-e0703n0:8851_0: Goṭṭhābhayassa dassehi, bahuṃ dassati te dhanaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:8854_0: Nisinnoyeva amari, so sīsaṃ tassa ādiya.
anya-e0703n0:8857_0: Datvā tassa dhanaṃ rañño, sakkāraṃ sādhukārayi.
anya-e0703n0:8863_0: Kārayitvā maṇḍayitvā, so bhikkhu tattha saṅghato.
anya-e0703n0:8896_0: Pāpakānaṃ niggahena, sodhento sāsanaṃ tu so.
anya-e0703n0:8913_0: Rañño kulūpago āsi, rājā tasmiṃ pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n0:8916_0: Appesi tassa bhikkhussa, so saṅgaṇhi dutiyakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:8925_0: Tato amacce katvāna, sayaṃ hutvāna pacchato;
anya-e0703n0:8932_0: Saṅghamittotu so bhikkhu, bhīto tasmiṃ narādhipā.
anya-e0703n0:8943_0: Maṇi duve mahagghe ca, mahāthūpe apūjayi;
anya-e0703n0:8986_0: Vinayavādī mayaṃ rāja, iti gāhiya bhūpabhiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:8989_0: Yo so sataṃ daṇḍiyo’ti, raññā daṇḍaṃ ṭhapāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:8998_0: Rājānaṃ saññāpetvā so, thero dummati dummatiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9001_0: Tathā kātuṃ manusse so, yojesi duṭṭhamānaso.
anya-e0703n0:9004_0: Soṇāmacco dāraṇo ca, bhikkhavo ca alajjino.
anya-e0703n0:9013_0: Āgamma subahuṃ pāpaṃ, akāsi so mahīpati.
anya-e0703n0:9030_0: Tatrā’gataṃ taṃ sutvā, sahāyaṃ so mahīpati;
anya-e0703n0:9036_0: Ādāya taṃ sayaṃyeva, rattiṃ nikkhamma ekako;
anya-e0703n0:9040_0: “Kasmā coro ahu me tvaṃ, “iti rājā apucchitaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9045_0: Iccheva mabravī rājā, rājānaṃ so khamāpayi;
anya-e0703n0:9067_0: Kāretvā loharūpāni, ṭhapāpesi duve tu so.
anya-e0703n0:9079_0: Kopetuṃ bhikkhavo keci, nilīyiṃsu tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9130_0: Ahiṃ vā’si visaṃ khippaṃ, kareyya’tthahitaṃ budho.
anya-e0703n0:9132_0: Ahu rājā sirimegha-vaṇṇo tassa suto tato;
anya-e0703n0:9141_0: Kiṃ kimevā”ti āhaṃsu, bhikkhavo taṃ narissaraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9147_0: Amacco soṇāmacco ca, saṅghamitto ca pāpiyo;
anya-e0703n0:9156_0: Taṃ sutvā pitukammaṃ so, nibbinno bālasaṅgame;
anya-e0703n0:9157_0: Pitarā nāsitaṃ tattha, sabbaṃ pākatikaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n0:9181_0: Tatraṭṭhame nivāsetvā, tato tu navame pana.
anya-e0703n0:9186_0: Laṃkādīpe ca sakale, sabbe ādāya bhikkhavo;
anya-e0703n0:9198_0: Vissajjetvā tahiṃ bhogaṃ, sabbaṃ therassa so pitā;
anya-e0703n0:9207_0: Tamhā oruyha so mahā, sayaṃ hutvā purecaro;
anya-e0703n0:9220_0: Tīhaṃ tatthāpi vāsesi, bimbaṃ taṃ jinasununo.
anya-e0703n0:9225_0: Paṭimaṃ nīharitvā taṃ, vihāraṃ sotthiyā karaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9253_0: Gahetvā bahumānena, katvā sammā na muttamaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9259_0: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ gehaṃ, dāṭhādhātugharaṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n0:9265_0: Tassa pūjāvidhiṃ kātu, meva rūpaṃ niyojayi.
anya-e0703n0:9271_0: Aṭṭhavīsatime vasse, gabho so tassa yā gati.
anya-e0703n0:9283_0: Citradantamayaṃ kiñci, tassa kammaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9288_0: Buddhadāso tato tassa, putto āsi mahīpati;
anya-e0703n0:9301_0: Pitā’va putte so satte, anukampittha bhūpati.
anya-e0703n0:9324_0: Tasmā phusitvā taṃ kammaṃ, kātuṃ sakkā na te mayā;
anya-e0703n0:9327_0: Evaṃ putte phaṇindo so, kevalaṃ phaṇamattano;
anya-e0703n0:9331_0: Satthaṃ gahetvā phāletvā, udaraṃ tassa bhogino.
anya-e0703n0:9333_0: Nīharitvā tato dosaṃ, katvā bhesajja muttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9334_0: Sappaṃ taṃ taṅkhaṇeneva, akāsi sukhitaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n0:9337_0: Tiracchānāpi jāniṃsu, sādhu rajjanti me kataṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9343_0: Miṇiṃ taṃ nayanaṃ rājā, vihāre abhayuttare.
anya-e0703n0:9349_0: Pāṇakā balavo hutvā, udaraṃ tassa khādisuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9351_0: Tato so upasaṅkamma, taṃ nivedesi rājino;
anya-e0703n0:9354_0: So āha” thusavitthimhi, gāme khīrena bhojane;
anya-e0703n0:9358_0: Rājā tassa sirāvedhaṃ, katvā ādāya lohitaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9374_0: Anto tu ditthatuṇḍena, tena dukkhena pīḷito;
anya-e0703n0:9375_0: Rājānaṃ magamā rājā, nidānaṃ tassa pucchiya.
anya-e0703n0:9377_0: Anto tu ditthatuṇḍena, tena dukkhena pīḷito;
anya-e0703n0:9378_0: Rājānaṃ magamā rājā, nidānaṃ tassa pucchiya.
anya-e0703n0:9384_0: Vivaritvā tadā sutto, tato tassa mukhantike.
anya-e0703n0:9393_0: Kammaṃ vijjati lokassa, kataṃ kiṃtena dukkaraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9396_0: Sabbādarena kubbanto, aho puñño dayo mama.
anya-e0703n0:9399_0: Jātaṃ sattasu vāresu, sagabbhaṃ sukhitaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n0:9407_0: Bhijjitvā āsi maṇḍūko, so vuddho tattha gacchati;
anya-e0703n0:9418_0: Yojesi vejja mekekaṃ, rājā gāma dvipañcake.
anya-e0703n0:9424_0: Kāresi saha bhogena, sālāyo ca mahāpathe.
anya-e0703n0:9430_0: Diṭṭhe diṭṭhe pamocesi, dukkhamhā dukkhite jane.
anya-e0703n0:9433_0: Saddhiṃ gacchati senāya, devehi viya vāsavo.
anya-e0703n0:9435_0: Taṃ disvā sirisobhagga-maggaṃ pattaṃ mahī patiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9451_0: “Ruṭṭho kimatthaṃ bho tva”nti, pucchi sabbamavoca so.
anya-e0703n0:9454_0: Avamaññāya maṃ mayhaṃ, parato to yāti hatthinā.
anya-e0703n0:9457_0: Hatthaṃ me eti kāretvā, sabbaṃ dāsāna niggahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9459_0: No ce hatthaṃ mamā’yāti, māretvā galalohitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9460_0: Pivissāmi na sandeho, na cireneva passasi”.
anya-e0703n0:9462_0: So gantvā narapālassa, pavattiṃ taṃ nivedayi;
anya-e0703n0:9471_0: Alabhanto sahāyaṃ me, nāsakkhi tassa ghātane;
anya-e0703n0:9474_0: Etha gehe vasitvā me, hotha me anuvattakā;
anya-e0703n0:9477_0: Iti vatvāna taṃ kuṭṭhaṃ, netvā so gharamattano;
anya-e0703n0:9490_0: Matoti sutvā tassā-si hadayaṃ phalitaṃ dvidhā.
anya-e0703n0:9528_0: Karonto tañca so rājā, mākhijjantu janā iti;
anya-e0703n0:9540_0: Ñatvā amacco taṃ netvā, uyyānaṃ jādayīgharaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9541_0: Evaṃ paṭicca attānaṃ, dukkhaṃ nākāsi pāṇinaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9547_0: Loke lokahitaṃ natthi, kataṃ kiñci mahesīnā.
anya-e0703n0:9562_0: Bhaṇantā ratanaṃ suttaṃ, siñcamānā jalaṃ tathā.
anya-e0703n0:9589_0: Katvā nivāpaṃ dāpesi, tadajjāpi ca vattati.
anya-e0703n0:9637_0: Vuttaṃ vuttaṃ viyākāsi, virodhampi ca dassayi.
anya-e0703n0:9651_0: Tattha ñāṇodayaṃ nāma, katvā makaraṇaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n0:9655_0: Taṃ disvā revato thero, idaṃ vacanamabruvi.
anya-e0703n0:9666_0: Taṃ tattha gantvā sutvā taṃ, māgadhānaṃ niruttiyā;
anya-e0703n0:9669_0: Evaṃ vutto pasanno so, nikkhamitvā tatoimaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9679_0: Potthake detha sabbe”ti, āha vīmaṃsituṃ sataṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9682_0: Ettha dassehi taṃ disvā, sabbe demā”ti potthake.
anya-e0703n0:9722_0: Evaṃ sabbe nidhanavasagā honti sattā’ti niccaṃ,
anya-e0703n0:9723_0: Rāgaṃ sammā vinayatudhane jīvite cāpi dhīmā.
anya-e0703n0:9734_0: Tasmiṃyeva dine bheriṃ, carāpetvā tadā tu sā.
anya-e0703n0:9739_0: Atha macco mahāpañño, sahāyo tassa taṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9742_0: Rajjayoggoti cintetvā, katvā taṃ bhūpatiṃ raho;
anya-e0703n0:9745_0: Yasaṃ rajjaṃ vicāresi, chaṇe patte mahājanā;
anya-e0703n0:9746_0: Rājā ce atthi amhehi, saddhiṃ metūti ghosayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9752_0: Rañño āṇāti vutte so, agā āruyha taṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9758_0: Mittaseno bahuṃ puññaṃ, katvā vassena so cuto.
anya-e0703n0:9770_0: Dhātusenavhayo āsi, dāṭhānāmo ca taṃ suto.
anya-e0703n0:9772_0: Gāme ambilayāgumhi, vasaṃ putte duve labhi;
anya-e0703n0:9775_0: Mātuso dariyo tesaṃ, saddho pabbajja vattati;
anya-e0703n0:9784_0: Sīse ākiri saṅkāraṃ, tassa ruṭṭho paroyati;
anya-e0703n0:9785_0: Tasmiṃ cittaṃ na dūsesi, tampi disvāna mātulo.
anya-e0703n0:9787_0: Uttamo vata’yaṃ satto, rājā hessati nicchayaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9791_0: Sikkhāpesi kumāraṃ taṃ, paṇḍuko taṃ vijāniya.
anya-e0703n0:9797_0: Pariveṇe na passiṃsu, tato nikkhamma te ubho.
anya-e0703n0:9802_0: Yathā nadiyaṃ vāreti, amhe taṃ tvampi vāraya;
anya-e0703n0:9803_0: Vāpiṃgahetvā etthe’ti, vatvā thero tadā nadiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9806_0: Nāgarājā tadā eko, piṭṭhiṃ pādāsi tena so.
anya-e0703n0:9809_0: Laddhā khīrodanaṃ sutvā, sesaṃ pattena tassa’dā.
anya-e0703n0:9812_0: Bhuñji theropi taṃ jāni, bhuñja te yaṃ mahiṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:9815_0: Cuto putto pipārindo, tatiyo tassa bhātuko.
anya-e0703n0:9826_0: Hate tasmiṃ mahīpāle, dāṭhiyo damiḷo tato;
anya-e0703n0:9838_0: Sodhetvā mediniṃ sādhu, katvā ca sukhitaṃjanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9842_0: Te maṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā no, rakkhiṃsū’ti pakuppiya.
anya-e0703n0:9871_0: Maṃ gano thūpaviṭṭhi ca, dhātusenopi uttare;
anya-e0703n0:9872_0: Pācina kambaviṭṭhi ca, tathā antarame giri.
anya-e0703n0:9881_0: Vāpīyo ca tathākatvā, tesameva tu dāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:9932_0: Samantā yojane tassa, tadā rakkhañca yojayi.
anya-e0703n0:9956_0: Yācito tehi tesaṃ’va, adāsi dharaṇī pati.
anya-e0703n0:9961_0: Anto bahi ca kāretvā, nagarassa jinālaye;
anya-e0703n0:9964_0: Tassa puññāni sabbāni, vatthu paṭipadaṃ naro;
anya-e0703n0:9965_0: Ko hi nāma samatthoti, mukhamattaṃ nidassitaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9970_0: Tathā pāṇasamā ekā, duhitā ca manoramā;
anya-e0703n0:9976_0: Ñatvā taṃ mātaraṃ tassa, naggaṃ jhapesi kujjhiya;
anya-e0703n0:9996_0: Ne’ti gutte na jānāsi, cittametassa bhūmipa;
anya-e0703n0:9999_0: Sutvā taṃ kupito dūte, pāhesī pitusantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10003_0: Tuṇhī ahosi te gantvā, rājakassa nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10008_0: Parissāmīti cintetvā, āha dūte sace mamaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10012_0: Pesesi dūte datvāna, rathaṃ jiṇṇena vājinā.
anya-e0703n0:10014_0: Evaṃ gacchati bhūpāle, pājento rathiko rathaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10015_0: Khādanto lājamassāpi, kiñci mattaṃ adāsi so.
anya-e0703n0:10017_0: Taṃ khāditvā pasīditvā, tasmiṃ pāṇamadā tadā;
anya-e0703n0:10021_0: Tasmā tāsu pamajjeyya, ko hi nāma sacetano.
anya-e0703n0:10023_0: Rājā etītisutvāna, thero so tassa soha do;
anya-e0703n0:10024_0: Laddhā māsodanaṃ maṃsaṃ, sāṇuṇañca varaṃ saraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10029_0: Evaṃ nisinnā sampatta-rajjā viya ubhopi te;
anya-e0703n0:10035_0: Tato vāpī mupagamma, oggayhitvā yathā sukhaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10038_0: Ettakaṃ me dhanaṃ bho’ti, sutvā taṃ rājasevakā;
anya-e0703n0:10041_0: Dhanaṃ rakkhati puttassa, dīpe bhindati mānuse;
anya-e0703n0:10044_0: Mārehi pitaraṃ meti, diṭṭhā piṭṭhīti verino;
anya-e0703n0:10048_0: Rājādisvā ca cintesi, pāpiyo’yaṃ mataṃ mama.
anya-e0703n0:10050_0: Kāyaṃ viya dukkhāpetvā, narakaṃ hetu micchati;
anya-e0703n0:10053_0: Iti mettāyamāno taṃ, āha senāpatiṃ pati;
anya-e0703n0:10063_0: Ko hi rajjeyya bhogesu, jīvitepi yasepi vā.
anya-e0703n0:10065_0: Dhātuseno narindo so, evaṃ puttahato gato;
anya-e0703n0:10091_0: Tattha nisseṇi gehāni, tena taṃ nāmako ahū.
anya-e0703n0:10094_0: Attano nihitānaṃ so, rakkhaṃ datvā tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10106_0: Muccissāmi kataṃ nu’ti, puññaṃ kāsi anappakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10108_0: Mahā vatthuni kāresi, dvāresu nagarassa so;
anya-e0703n0:10109_0: Ambuyyāne ca kāresi, dīpe yojana yojane.
anya-e0703n0:10112_0: Adhikaṃ bhogagāme ca, adhikaṃ tassa dāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:10114_0: Bodhi uppalavaṇṇā ca, tassāsuṃ dhītaro duve;
anya-e0703n0:10117_0: Dente tasmiṃ na icchiṃsu, samaṇā theravādino;
anya-e0703n0:10121_0: Bhikkhave adhivāsesuṃ, bhogo no satthuno iti.
anya-e0703n0:10123_0: Kathā niyyanti uyyāne, samīpe pabbatassa so;
anya-e0703n0:10124_0: Kārāpesi vihāraṃ so, tesaṃ nāmo tato ahu.
anya-e0703n0:10136_0: Samādiyi dhutaṅge ca, likhāpesi ca potthake.
anya-e0703n0:10139_0: Bhito so paralokamhā, moggallānā ca vattati.
anya-e0703n0:10147_0: Rājā sutvā gahetvā taṃ, bhañjissāmiti nikkhami;
anya-e0703n0:10159_0: Disvā taṃ sāmikono’yaṃ, palāyati bhaṇe iti;
anya-e0703n0:10165_0: Katvā’ḷāhana kiccaṃ so, tassa kamme pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n0:10168_0: Bhikkhū sutvā pavattiṃ taṃ, sunivatthā supārutā;
anya-e0703n0:10175_0: Chattattena saṅghaṃ pūjesi, saṅgho tasseva taṃ adā.
anya-e0703n0:10177_0: Taṃ ṭhānaṃ chattavaḍḍhīti, vohariṃsu tahiṃ kataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10183_0: Kuddho nīhari dāṭhaṃso, ghātakaṃ pituno mama;
anya-e0703n0:10184_0: Anuvattitvā maccāti, tena rakkhasa nāma vā.
anya-e0703n0:10193_0: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ dānaṃ, dīpe ajjāpi vattati.
anya-e0703n0:10198_0: Taṃ disvā paridevitvā, pituno pema mattanī;
anya-e0703n0:10227_0: Ammaṃ saṅghassa pādāsi, saṅgho tasmiṃ pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n0:10228_0: Āha’mba sāmaṇero’ti, tena taṃ nāmako ahu.
anya-e0703n0:10233_0: Tassa katvāna sakkāraṃ, gahetvā kesa dhātuyo;
anya-e0703n0:10240_0: Ṭhapesi paṭimāyo ca, assa bimbañca cārukaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10258_0: Katvā’ṭṭhārasame vasse, so puññāni khayaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:10261_0: Jetuṃ no visahittha maccumupagaṃ so yevadāsoviya;
anya-e0703n0:10262_0: Tasmā maccubalaṃ nihacca sukhino hessanti medhāvino;
anya-e0703n0:10271_0: Ahu tassa suto rājā, devarūpo mahābalo.
anya-e0703n0:10279_0: Tittiseno suto tassa, rājā hutvā anekadhā;
anya-e0703n0:10280_0: Katvā puññāni rajjaṃ taṃ, māsampi navame jahi.
anya-e0703n0:10282_0: Sivo taṃ mātulo hantvā, hutvā rājā anappakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10285_0: Upatisso tato āsi, rājā hantvāna sīvakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10291_0: Eko putto ahu rañño, upatissassa kassapo;
anya-e0703n0:10298_0: Dakkhiṇaṃ malayaṃ gantvā, saṅgaṇhitvā mahā balaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10301_0: Taṃ sutvā kassapo jeṭṭho, varamāruyha kuñjaraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10307_0: Hatthe katvā upāyena, dese pācina pacchime.
anya-e0703n0:10319_0: Yujjhitvā viralā āsuṃ, tato cintesi kassapo.
anya-e0703n0:10322_0: Parihīnaṃ balaṃ rājā, andhako ca mahallako.
anya-e0703n0:10325_0: Aṅgahetvā balaṃ pacchā, coro niggaṇhi yo iti.
anya-e0703n0:10333_0: Silākāḷo pavattiṃ taṃ, sutvā saṅgamma vegasā;
anya-e0703n0:10340_0: Puñchitvā lohitaṃ katvā, kosiyaṃ asi puttikaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10354_0: Anvahaṃ pūjayi bodhiṃ, paṭimāyo ca kārayi;
anya-e0703n0:10370_0: Gantvā tattha vasāhīti, sopi gantvā tahiṃ vasi.
anya-e0703n0:10378_0: Tassa dvādasame vasse, ito kāsi puraṃ gato;
anya-e0703n0:10387_0: Ṭhapetvā anuvassaṃ tu, netvā jetavanaṃ mahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10388_0: Kātuṃ kāresi cārittaṃ, hitaṃ mantvāna pāṇinaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10405_0: Sāparādhāna te me vā, manussā dīpavāsino;
anya-e0703n0:10408_0: Tasmā aññena yujjhantu, ubhoyeva mayaṃ idha;
anya-e0703n0:10412_0: Āruyha munino māro viya otthari tāvade.
anya-e0703n0:10423_0: Rājā ārabhi taṃ disvā, chindituṃ sīsamattano;
anya-e0703n0:10427_0: Chaḍḍesi chahi so rajjaṃ, māsehi divasehi ca.
anya-e0703n0:10429_0: Moggallāno tato rājā, āsi dīpe mahābalo;
anya-e0703n0:10457_0: Datvā bhutvā yathākāmaṃ, vasse vīsatime mari.
anya-e0703n0:10468_0: Mahesī sā sadā āsi, padhānā sabbakammasu;
anya-e0703n0:10472_0: Dubbale ca viheṭhesuṃ, balī jānapadā narā.
anya-e0703n0:10489_0: Bījaṃ bhaginī māyāci, bījagāhañca tassa sā;
anya-e0703n0:10495_0: Taṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā so, aladdhā kiñci bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10502_0: Datvā āhari āhāraṃ, so taṃ bhutvā pasīdiya.
anya-e0703n0:10511_0: So bhīto purime yāme, āgataṃ taṃ na sambhusī.
anya-e0703n0:10514_0: Gahetvā khipi tīheva, aṅgulīhi sataṃ chupi.
anya-e0703n0:10516_0: So taṃ byākāsi taṃ ditvā, sabalaṃ me parissamaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10517_0: Tīhi rājūhi yujjhitvā, catutthaṃ tvaṃ nighātiya.
anya-e0703n0:10519_0: Vuḍḍho tīṇeva vassāni, rājā hutvā na jīvasi;
anya-e0703n0:10520_0: Tathā hessanti rājāno, tayo te vaṃsajā narā.
anya-e0703n0:10522_0: Gantvā sevassu rājānaṃ, pacchā passasi mekhalaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10523_0: Iti vatvāna pesesi, sopi gantvā narissaraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10526_0: Taṃ akāsi taduṭṭhānaṃ, bhaṇḍamāhari so bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10529_0: Datvā ṭhānantaraṃ tassa, gantuṃ tattheva yojayi.
anya-e0703n0:10532_0: Ādāya gantvā taṃ desaṃ, parivattesi sabbaso.
anya-e0703n0:10534_0: Paccekabhogaṃ katvāna, rohaṇaṃ tattha so vasaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10540_0: Rajjaṃ gahetuṃ kāloti, sīghaṃ āgamma rohaṇā;
anya-e0703n0:10543_0: Sayaṃ hutvā mahīpālo, desaṃ katvā yathā pure;
anya-e0703n0:10579_0: Sappañño taṃ saranto bhavatu bhavasukhaṃ vantukāmo hitesī.
anya-e0703n0:10640_0: Keḷivāte ca kāresi, sumanaṃ nāma pabbataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10646_0: Gāmaṃ datvā niyojesi, ārakkhaṃ dhītu nāmakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10649_0: Dāṭhā sivassa ṭhatvāna, ovāde sādhu bhikkhuno;
anya-e0703n0:10659_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ catusaṭṭhīnaṃ, vihāraṃ taṃ tadā adā.
anya-e0703n0:10676_0: Chattaṃ soṇṇañca kāresi, nikāyesupi tīsu so;
anya-e0703n0:10680_0: Tattha tattha ca pūjesi, mahagghaṃ ratanuttamaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10692_0: Hatthamukkhippi taṃ hantuṃ, gaṇḍo sañjāyi taṃkhaṇe.
anya-e0703n0:10698_0: Rakkhituṃ taṃ niyojesi, theraṃ sopi tamācari.
anya-e0703n0:10701_0: Katvevaṃ bahudhā puññaṃ, catuttiṃse same mato.
anya-e0703n0:10703_0: Aggabodhi tato āsi, rājā pubbassa rājino;
anya-e0703n0:10719_0: Jotipālamhi pabbaji, rājā sakkāsi taṃ ciraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10737_0: Vandamāne pabhijjitvā, bhāgo taṃ purato pati.
anya-e0703n0:10740_0: Rājā disvāva saṃviggo, kammaṃ paṭṭhapi taṃkhaṇe.
anya-e0703n0:10748_0: Sace rājā papañceti, kātuṃ dhātugharaṃ mayaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10751_0: Rājā pabuddho saṃviggo, na cireneva kārayi;
anya-e0703n0:10754_0: Catasso paṭimāyo ca, pallaṅke ca silāmaye;
anya-e0703n0:10775_0: Nāmaṃ katvāna so’kāsi, attano ca mahesiyā;
anya-e0703n0:10788_0: Evaṃ puññāni katvā so, divaṃ’gā dasame same.
anya-e0703n0:10791_0: Maccusseva vasaṃ tatohi matimā sammā bhavassīdisaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10792_0: Passanto niyamaṃ vihāya vidhinā sabbaṃ bhave saṅgatiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10801_0: Sāsanassa ca raṭṭhassa, vuddhikāmo naye rato.
anya-e0703n0:10813_0: Balaṃ so sannipātento, vāsaṃ tattheva kappayi.
anya-e0703n0:10822_0: Yena kenaci lesena, sayaṃ dukkhiva dummano.
anya-e0703n0:10824_0: Āturo viya bāḷhaṃ so, hosi mañcaparāyano;
anya-e0703n0:10828_0: Handa tvaṃ nagaraṃ rakkha, nate sakkā mayā saha.
anya-e0703n0:10834_0: Rājā dvisvā’ti nibinno, yāva mando na hessati.
anya-e0703n0:10843_0: Putto disvā narindassa, ghātessāmi imaṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:10845_0: Āha rājā nivāresi, mā te rucci balaṃ idaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10854_0: Corassa senā taṃ ditvā, haritvā sāmino adā;
anya-e0703n0:10858_0: Gantvā taṃ parivāresi, rājā āsi tadekako.
anya-e0703n0:10866_0: Upāgamma puraṃ rājā, āsī laṅkā talādhipo;
anya-e0703n0:10867_0: Tato cintesi jīvante, sattumhi na sukhaṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:10869_0: So sutvā pubbarājassa, putto etthāti kujjhiya;
anya-e0703n0:10872_0: Upakkami tadā raññā, āṇatto puriso khaṇe;
anya-e0703n0:10873_0: Chindituṃ hatthapādaṃ so, kumāro rodi dummano.
anya-e0703n0:10875_0: Pūvakhādakahatthaṃ me, chindeyyaṃ ce tadā ahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10876_0: Khādisaṃ tena pūveti, haṃ sutvā rājakammiko.
anya-e0703n0:10879_0: Vāmaṃ hatthañca pādañca, tassa chindi narādhamo.
anya-e0703n0:10891_0: Sāsanaṃ tassa pesesuṃ, rājā sutvā visesato.
anya-e0703n0:10896_0: Sīsaṃ gaṇhatha tattheva, rañño ca tanayassa ca;
anya-e0703n0:10903_0: Sīsaṃ me paṭhamaṃ chetvā, detha mayhaṃ sukhaṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:10909_0: Tattha laggā kathaṃ niccaṃ, sukhaṃ bho na gavesatha.
anya-e0703n0:10914_0: Chinnasīso mayā diṭṭho, mayi jīvati sāmiko;
anya-e0703n0:10915_0: Ṭhapetvā hampi sevāmi, aho aññañhi sāmikaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10917_0: Idha taṃ mārayitvāna, chāyaṃ tassa harissatha;
anya-e0703n0:10918_0: Aho aññāṇakā tumhe, maññe ummattakā iti.
anya-e0703n0:10920_0: Iti vatvāna so pāde, gahetvā sāmino sayi;
anya-e0703n0:10921_0: Tassa te haraṇopāyaṃ, apassantā yathā tathā.
anya-e0703n0:10923_0: Tassāpi sīsaṃ chetvāna, maccā ādāya tīṇi’pi;
anya-e0703n0:10951_0: Vihāraṃ naṃ bahunnaṃ so, bhogagāme bahū adā.
anya-e0703n0:10960_0: Taṃ sutvā so asiggāho, saputto rohaṇaṃgato.
anya-e0703n0:10962_0: Vasanto tattha so katvā, hatthe janapadaṃ lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10972_0: Upaddutā matā āsuṃ, taṃ sutvā so asiggaho.
anya-e0703n0:10981_0: Sāsanaṃ tassa pesesi, ehi rājā bhavāhīti.
anya-e0703n0:10983_0: So taññatvā palāyitvā, nivatto malayaṃ agā;
anya-e0703n0:10984_0: Kathañhi laddhaṃ kicchena, rajjaṃso deti me iti.
anya-e0703n0:10986_0: Evaṃ kho dallanāmaṃ so, moggallānaṃ narissaraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11010_0: Gantvāna paratīraṃ so, ādāya damiḷe bahū;
anya-e0703n0:11013_0: Rājāpi sutvā taṃ gantvā, yujjhitvā rājamittake;
anya-e0703n0:11014_0: Gāme hantvāna taṃ tena, damiḷe saddhimāgate.
anya-e0703n0:11017_0: Adāsi dāse katvāna, vihāresu tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11020_0: Sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ visodhetvā, vasante akuto bhaye.
anya-e0703n0:11023_0: Dussīle bahule disvā, pabbajjāya navopi so.
anya-e0703n0:11026_0: Rājā te neva kāresi, dhammakammaṃ vihārake.
anya-e0703n0:11028_0: Dussīlā nihaṭā tena, sabbe mantiya ekato;
anya-e0703n0:11029_0: Raho taṃ mārayitvāna, taṃ kammaṃ paṭibāhayyuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11031_0: Rājā sutvā tadā kuddho, sabbegaṇhiya ekato;
anya-e0703n0:11034_0: Aññe tattha sataṃ bhikkhū, jambudīpe khipāpayi;
anya-e0703n0:11037_0: Bhikkhū theriyavāde so, kātuṃ tehi uposathaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11040_0: Akkositvā ca bhāsitvā, vācāhi pharusāhi so;
anya-e0703n0:11043_0: Tassa so mahatā phuṭṭho, rogena marisajjukaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11046_0: Tassa putto tato agga-bodhi nāmo kumārako;
anya-e0703n0:11052_0: Rājā so pubbarājūnaṃ, pavattaṃ na vināsiya;
anya-e0703n0:11055_0: Jeṭṭhatisso’tha taṃ sabbaṃ, suṇitvā malaye ṭhito;
anya-e0703n0:11065_0: Sabalaṃ pacchimaṃ desaṃ, so gantvā taṃ palāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:11082_0: Jeṭṭhatisso tato hutvā, pure rājāyathā pure;
anya-e0703n0:11107_0: Tattha tattha nilīnā te, desaṃ hantumupakkamuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11112_0: Paratīraṃ gato rājā, gahetvā damiḷaṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11134_0: Chetvā hatthimhi appetvā, churikaṃ kosiyaṃ khipi.
anya-e0703n0:11146_0: Khipitvā churikaṃ āha, evaṃ devo mato iti.
anya-e0703n0:11148_0: Sā taṃ disvā-tisokena, phāletvā hadayaṃ matā;
anya-e0703n0:11149_0: Evaṃ pañcahi māsehi, rājā so tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:11152_0: Rajjaṃ pākatikaṃ katvā, viharanto pure vare.
anya-e0703n0:11172_0: Māṇassa maraṇaṃ sutvā, gahetvā damiḷe lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11179_0: Ekāvaliṃ gahetvāva, ekākī so hi nikkhami.
anya-e0703n0:11191_0: Gaṇhī tīsu nikāyesu, sāraṃ dhātugharesu ca.
anya-e0703n0:11221_0: Nāsakkhi kira vāretuṃ, aho pāpā nivāriyā.
anya-e0703n0:11229_0: Tatra ṭhito soḷasame, vasse byādhihato mato;
anya-e0703n0:11230_0: Tadā tassa kaṇiṭṭho so, yuvarājāpi kassapo.
anya-e0703n0:11287_0: Tassāsuṃ bahavo puttā, jeṭṭho tesañca māṇako;
anya-e0703n0:11290_0: Tato so byādhinā phuṭṭho, atekicchena kenaci;
anya-e0703n0:11291_0: Puttā me bālakā sabbe, ne’te rajjakkhamā iti.
anya-e0703n0:11294_0: Āhuya sabbaṃ pādāsi, rajjaṃ puttehi attano.
anya-e0703n0:11305_0: Ekato damiḷā hutvā, nibbāsema imaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n0:11306_0: Tasmiṃ ṭhite bahiddhāva, aggahesuṃ puraṃ sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11312_0: Pitā sutvāna taṃ āgā, na cīreneva rohaṇā.
anya-e0703n0:11315_0: Umiḷehi tato jātā, sabbe te samavuttino.
anya-e0703n0:11317_0: Tato so pitaraṃ rajje, abhisiñcittha māṇako;
anya-e0703n0:11324_0: Khaṇenā’gā imaṃ dīpaṃ, gahetvā damiḷhaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11326_0: Tadā te damiḷā sabbe, paribhūtā idha ṭhitā;
anya-e0703n0:11329_0: Māṇopi sutvā taṃ sabbaṃ, nāyaṃ kāloti yujjhituṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11332_0: Pubbadesaṃ sayaṃ gantvā, saṅgaṇhanto janaṃ vasī;
anya-e0703n0:11333_0: Laddhā damiḷapakkhaṃ so, gahetvā rājakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11336_0: Mātulaṃ viya taṃ loko, tena nāmena vohari.
anya-e0703n0:11360_0: Theriyā te kibāhetvā, balaṃ tatheva kārayi.
anya-e0703n0:11362_0: Atha te te theriyā bhikkhū, dummaññū tattha rājini;
anya-e0703n0:11365_0: Vuttañhi muninā tena, assaddho yo upāsako;
anya-e0703n0:11366_0: Alābhāya ca bhikkhūnaṃ, ceteta’kkosati ca te.
anya-e0703n0:11368_0: Pattanikujjanaṃ tassa, kattabbanti tato hi te;
anya-e0703n0:11369_0: Tassa taṃ kammamakaruṃ, loko maññittha aññathā.
anya-e0703n0:11374_0: Tasmiṃ so samaye phuṭṭho, byādhinā mahatāmari;
anya-e0703n0:11377_0: Dappulopi tato rājā, gato rohaṇakaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11392_0: Ekāva dhītā tassāsi, rājanamagamā ca sā;
anya-e0703n0:11408_0: Sayaṃ vaccakuṭī esa, tattha sodhesi buddhimā.
anya-e0703n0:11416_0: Isseraṃ tattha vattesi, sampamaddiya satta vo;
anya-e0703n0:11419_0: Tassa tuṭṭho jano āha, mahāsāmīti esano;
anya-e0703n0:11423_0: Tassa pādāsi santuṭṭho, guṇehi bahukehi ca.
anya-e0703n0:11429_0: Dhammaṃ sutvā pasīditvā, tasmiṃ taṃ bahumānituṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11431_0: Vihāraṃ rohaṇe katvā, tassa pādāsi sopi taṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11459_0: Akāsi ca sayaṃ sādhu, parivārehī kārayi.
anya-e0703n0:11462_0: Vihārā nekakā āsuṃ, katā tehi sappaccayā.
anya-e0703n0:11464_0: Kadāci maggaṃ gacchaṃ so, araññamhi agāmake;
anya-e0703n0:11470_0: Alabhanto tadā niddaṃ, kinnu kho iti kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11473_0: Adisvā kāraṇaṃ anto, avassaṃ bahi hessati;
anya-e0703n0:11476_0: Evamāha ca nissaṅkaṃ, ayyakā mama rattiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11477_0: Tementā rukkhamūlasmiṃ, ṭhitā ānetha te iti.
anya-e0703n0:11482_0: Te gantvā sāsanaṃ rañño, ārocesuṃ padhāviso;
anya-e0703n0:11483_0: Disvā ca bhikkhu santuṭṭho, netvā vāsagharaṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11489_0: Nisīdāpiya te sabbe, sayane sādhu santhate.
anya-e0703n0:11501_0: Katvāna pituno senaṃ, dhanaṃ cevā harāpiya.
anya-e0703n0:11507_0: Yodhā dāṭho patissassa, māṇaṃ saṅgaṃva mārayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11509_0: Taṃ sutvā dappulo sopi, sokasallahato mari;
anya-e0703n0:11513_0: Tasmā tassa kathā āsi, rohaṇamhi idhāpi ca.
anya-e0703n0:11537_0: Yattha katthaci disvāpi, bhikkhavo so mahāmati;
anya-e0703n0:11550_0: Bhogagāme ca dāpesi, tattha tattha bahūdaye.
anya-e0703n0:11564_0: Ete aññe ca so datvā, bhogagāme narissaro;
anya-e0703n0:11565_0: Dāsi ārāmike ceva, attano kira ñātake.
anya-e0703n0:11568_0: Disvāpi ca sutvā vā, bhogagāme bahū adā.
anya-e0703n0:11573_0: Anussaranto so tiṇṇaṃ, ratanānaṃ guṇe vare;
anya-e0703n0:11583_0: Gāmaṃ niṭṭhilaveṭṭhiñca, tassā’dā so sadā sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11598_0: Bhassa rañño’ nuvattantā, evaṃ dhammīhi pāṇino.
anya-e0703n0:11617_0: Dīpe maṇḍalikā sabbe, tattha tattha yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11638_0: Rājā bhaṇḍañca taṃ sabbaṃ, sabbañca balavāhanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11641_0: Evaṃ soḷasame vasse, rājā āsi divaṅgato;
anya-e0703n0:11647_0: Vinā raññā na sakkāti, mediniṃ paribhuñjituṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11651_0: Tassa nāmaṃ ṭhapetvāna, sayaṃ sabbaṃ vicārayi.
anya-e0703n0:11660_0: Tampi rajje bhisiñcitvā, yathā pubbaṃ sayaṃvasī.
anya-e0703n0:11674_0: Rañño tassaccaye rājā, māṇavammo ahosi so;
anya-e0703n0:11675_0: Kiṃ gotto kassa putto ca, kathaṃ rajjamapāpuṇi.
anya-e0703n0:11681_0: Taṃ labhitvā vasaṃ dese, uttare līnavuttiko.
anya-e0703n0:11686_0: Gantvā vatvā sakaṃ nāmaṃ, sevituṃ tamupakkami;
anya-e0703n0:11704_0: So taṃ gahetvā cintesi, sakhaṃ pesa narādhipo;
anya-e0703n0:11705_0: Ucchiṭṭhaṃ nāma kiṃ hoti, sattānaṃ paramatthato.
anya-e0703n0:11707_0: Tasmā yuttaṃ mayāpātu-mīti cintiya taṃ pivi;
anya-e0703n0:11710_0: Rājāpi disvā taṃ bhīto, tassapī tāva sesakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11711_0: Sayaṃ pivi tathāhoti, kammaṃ puññavataṃ sadā.
anya-e0703n0:11714_0: Bhojane sayane ceva, parihāre ca vāhane.
anya-e0703n0:11719_0: Ayaṃ kho mama sevāya, rajjaṃ vaṃsa gataṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11722_0: Sace sopi mayā gantvā, yujjhanto maraṇaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n0:11723_0: Takkitaṃ tassa mayhañca, sabbaṃ tamaphalaṃ bhave.
anya-e0703n0:11725_0: Evaṃ cintiyataṃ rājā, nivattetvā sake pure;
anya-e0703n0:11729_0: Rājā mīyati yuddhamhi, kiṃ phalaṃ mama jīvite.
anya-e0703n0:11734_0: Tasmā yuttaṃ mayā gantuṃ, sahasaṅgāma maṇḍalaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11735_0: Sukhañhi saddhiṃ tenettha, jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃpi vā.
anya-e0703n0:11738_0: Gantvā dassesi attānaṃ, so taṃ saṅgāma maṇḍale.
anya-e0703n0:11741_0: Saho santhavametasmiṃ, kattabbaṃ me kataṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:11743_0: Tato mānassa senā ca, senā cevassarājino;
anya-e0703n0:11750_0: Āliṅgatvā sinehena, tvaṃ kho me jayado iti.
anya-e0703n0:11755_0: Athevaṃ cintayi rājā, kattabbaṃ me sahāyako;
anya-e0703n0:11764_0: Mayāpi tassa kattabbaṃ, kammaṃ sādhu sukhāvahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11767_0: Evaṃ vutte amaccā te, paccāhaṃsu mahīpati;
anya-e0703n0:11768_0: Yaṃ yamicchati devohi, taṃ taṃ ruccati no iti.
anya-e0703n0:11770_0: Atha so māṇavammassa, senaṃ datvā savāhanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11785_0: Tadā sā damiḷi senā, assosi kira sāmiko;
anya-e0703n0:11791_0: Māṇavammo ca cintesi, sabbā senā gatā mama;
anya-e0703n0:11792_0: Mate mayi samijjheyya, verino me manorathaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11795_0: Puna rajjaṃ gahessaṃti, tasmā evamakāsi so.
anya-e0703n0:11803_0: Rajjatthaṃ me sahā yo maṃ, sevantoyeva addhago;
anya-e0703n0:11804_0: Vuddho hessati taṃ passaṃ, kathaṃ rajjaṃ karomahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11806_0: Imasmiṃ pana vārasmiṃ, pesayitvā balaṃ mama;
anya-e0703n0:11807_0: Rajjaṃ taṃ na gahessāmi, ko attho jīvitena me.
anya-e0703n0:11809_0: Evaṃ cintiya so senaṃ, sannipātiya attano;
anya-e0703n0:11816_0: Nāvaṃ ārohituṃ sabbe, na icchiṃsu tadā janā.
anya-e0703n0:11818_0: Tadā sīho vicintetvā, sayaṃ hutvā tirohito;
anya-e0703n0:11822_0: Āropetvāna taṃ nāvaṃ, gaccha ṭhatvāna sāgare.
anya-e0703n0:11825_0: So’pi sabbaṃ tathākāsi, rājāno agamā iti.
anya-e0703n0:11827_0: Āruhiṃsu janā nāvaṃ, ekaṃ katvā narādhipaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11828_0: So taṃ senaṅgamādāya, māṇo gantuṃ samārabhi.
anya-e0703n0:11831_0: Atha so paṭṭanaṃ patvā, otaritvā savāhano.
anya-e0703n0:11833_0: Vissāmetvā balaṃ tattha, vasaṃ katipaye dine;
anya-e0703n0:11848_0: Tato taṃ sāmiko disvā, sahāyo me ayaṃciraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11849_0: Tasmā na sakkā caḍḍetuṃ, āpade saraṇāgataṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11851_0: Sāmino ca sahāyassa, niddosohaṃ kathaṃ bhave;
anya-e0703n0:11852_0: Iti cintiya pūvaṃ so, savisaṃ khādiyā’mari.
anya-e0703n0:11854_0: Kuṭṭhakopi ca teneva, khāditvā pūvakaṃ mato;
anya-e0703n0:11857_0: Māṇavammo tato dīpe, chattaṃ ussāpayi tadā;
anya-e0703n0:11858_0: Vārento viya teneva, dukkhaṃ dīpe janassa so.
anya-e0703n0:11861_0: Samattho kohi taṃ sabbaṃ, vattuṃ paṭipadaṃ naro.
anya-e0703n0:11872_1: Ito paṭṭhāya aggabodhissa rajjapaṭibaddhā kathā vira khāyati.]
anya-e0703n0:11876_0: Dāsi dhammarucinaṃ so, rājinī dīpakampi ca.
anya-e0703n0:11900_0: Dānabhaṇḍañca so sabbaṃ, sabbesaṃ dāsi pāṇinaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11903_0: Dhammañca tesaṃ deseti, dātuṃ lokuttaraṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11905_0: Kammaṃ sovaggiyaṃ tassa, rajje sabbo samācari;
anya-e0703n0:11906_0: Yaṃ karoti mahīpālo, taṃ tassa kurute jano.
anya-e0703n0:11915_0: Vinayaṃ yanti sabbepi, kotaṃ nāseyya paṇḍito.
anya-e0703n0:11917_0: Payogo yo hi sattānaṃ, lohadvaya hitāvaho;
anya-e0703n0:11920_0: Attano so nivatthāni, vatthāni sukhumāni ca;
anya-e0703n0:11924_0: Sāvajjo paribhogo vā, tassa nāhosi sabbaso.
anya-e0703n0:11926_0: Ye ye sattā yadā hārā, tesaṃ taṃ taṃ sadāpayi;
anya-e0703n0:11927_0: Ye yena sukhī honti, te te tena sukhāpayī.
anya-e0703n0:11932_0: Atha tassa nujo rājā, kassapo hoti khattiyo;
anya-e0703n0:11935_0: Pitā viya niyaṃ puttaṃ, so saṅgaṇhi mahājanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11954_0: Mato pubbeva tasmā, so saranto taṃ na icchitaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11959_0: Teneva vuttaṃ muninā, dhammā yekeci lokiyā;
anya-e0703n0:11962_0: Kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma, sabbe te honti pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11965_0: Ādipādova so tasmā, hutvā rajjaṃ vicārayi;
anya-e0703n0:11971_0: Desaṃ datvāna pācinaṃ, vasituṃ tattha pesiya;
anya-e0703n0:11977_0: Adatvā yācakānaṃ so, nu kiñci paribhuñjati;
anya-e0703n0:11978_0: Bhuttaṃ vā satiyā deti, dvi guṇaṃ attabhuttato.
anya-e0703n0:11993_0: Mato āsi tato tassa, rajjaṃ hatthagataṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n0:11995_0: So taṃ hatthagataṃ katvā, saṇṭhapetvāna sāsanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11998_0: Sa āgantvā ahu rājā, silāmeghoti saññito;
anya-e0703n0:12001_0: So rājā naṃ niyojetvā, cintā bhāraṃ vimuñciya;
anya-e0703n0:12002_0: Bhoge bhuñjatha tumheti, sayaṃ rajjaṃ vicārayi.
anya-e0703n0:12005_0: Dese ubbinayaṃ sabbaṃ, maggaṃ pāpesi cakkhumā.
anya-e0703n0:12008_0: Na labhantā vicintesuṃ, bhinditabbā ime iti.
anya-e0703n0:12011_0: Tuvaṃ rājāsi nāmena, rājā añño sabhāvaho.
anya-e0703n0:12014_0: Saṅgayha na cireneva, hoti rājā na saṃsayo.
anya-e0703n0:12017_0: Kumāropi vidhitvā taṃ, coro hutvāna rājindo.
anya-e0703n0:12019_0: Palāyitvā sakaṃ desaṃ, saṅgaṇhitvā tahiṃ jane;
anya-e0703n0:12023_0: Gato tattha parājitvā, kumāro malayaṃ vaso.
anya-e0703n0:12025_0: Tato rājā kataññū so, upakāraṃ sabhātuno;
anya-e0703n0:12028_0: Kumāropi ca taṃ sutvā, ahosi muducittako;
anya-e0703n0:12031_0: Rājā gantvā sayaṃyeva, malayaṃ ekako vaṃso;
anya-e0703n0:12032_0: Kumāraṃ taṃ samādāya, āgamittha sakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12037_0: Tāya saddhiṃ vasanto so, vissattho tena rājinā;
anya-e0703n0:12038_0: Pahāraṃ tāya pādāsi, duṭṭho dosamhi kismiṃci.
anya-e0703n0:12041_0: Akāraṇe maṃ māreti, dinno vo sāmiko iti.
anya-e0703n0:12043_0: Sopi taṃ sutamatteva, dukkataṃ vata me iti;
anya-e0703n0:12044_0: Pabbājesi lahuṃ gantvā, bhikkhūnī na mupassayaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12050_0: Aññato taṃ gahetvāna, gato ekova rohaṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12058_0: Kasiṇaṃ rohaṇaṃ hattha-gataṃ katvā mahā balo;
anya-e0703n0:12059_0: Yujjhitvā tena taṃ gaṇhi, bhariyaṃ saṅghamattano.
anya-e0703n0:12061_0: Tato paṭṭhāya sukhitā, samaggā te tayo janā;
anya-e0703n0:12067_0: Hatthi kucchivihāre ca, vihāre puna piṭṭhike;
anya-e0703n0:12071_0: Kāsi pākatikaṃ tattha, thambhe ca parivattayi.
anya-e0703n0:12073_0: Evaṃ katvāna puññāni, puññāni ca yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12082_0: Mahābodhissa kāresi, gharaṃ jiṇṇaṃ navaṃ thiraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12083_0: Ārāme dve ca kāresi, kaḷandaṃ mallavātakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12097_0: Tato pubbeva tassāsi, putto so yuvarājako;
anya-e0703n0:12098_0: Mato kira tato rajjaṃ, aputtaṃ taṃ tadā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:12100_0: Putto mahindo nāmā’si, silā meghassa rājino;
anya-e0703n0:12106_0: Datvā tesaṃ dhanaṃ sādhu, pavattiṃ taṃ nigūhayi;
anya-e0703n0:12107_0: Atha naṃ so vayappattaṃ, katvā senāpatiṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12109_0: Rajjaṃ vasseva katvāna, sabbaṃ hatthe sayaṃvasī;
anya-e0703n0:12110_0: So dhammena vicāresi, rāja kiccaṃ mahāmati.
anya-e0703n0:12113_0: Senāpaccaṃ na gaṇhittha, nayaññū tassa hatthako.
anya-e0703n0:12115_0: Tadā kenaci gantvā so, karaṇīyena rājino;
anya-e0703n0:12119_0: Corā rajjaṃ gahetvāna, nāseyyuṃ nagaraṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:12124_0: So taṃ sutvā mahāseno, gantvā uttaradesakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12127_0: Gantvā rañño mataṭhānaṃ, disvā deviṃ parodiya;
anya-e0703n0:12130_0: Mācintesi mahādevī, mato me sāmiko iti;
anya-e0703n0:12131_0: Rakkhissāmi ahaṃ dīpaṃ, tumhe rajjaṃ karissatha.
anya-e0703n0:12134_0: Raho yojayī taṃ hantuṃ, vatthukāmā yathāruciṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12136_0: Senāpati taṃ ñatvāna, tassā’rakkhaṃ vidhāya so;
anya-e0703n0:12140_0: Ādāya taṃ puraṃ gantvā, rajjaṃ gaṇhi sasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12151_0: Deviñca taṃ samādāya, agamā tattha sajjukaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12157_0: Palāpetvāna taṃ tattha, senāpati sukhaṃ vasi.
anya-e0703n0:12160_0: Dese sabbe samāgamma, aggahesuṃ puraṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n0:12162_0: So hi te paṭibāhesi, sūro dhīraparakkamo;
anya-e0703n0:12168_0: Pacchā anu balappatto, dappulo malayaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n0:12178_0: Gajjitena bhaṭānañca, ākāsaṃ na tadā phali.
anya-e0703n0:12184_0: Nagaraṃ no’parundhiṃsu, kintu kattabba mettha vo.
anya-e0703n0:12186_0: Evaṃ vuttā tamāhaṃsu, sūrā tassa raṇatthino;
anya-e0703n0:12189_0: Evaṃ bhūte sace kāle, ohīnā jīvibhatthino;
anya-e0703n0:12190_0: Posesi sāmi kiṃ kāla-mettakaṃ no yathā sukhaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12192_0: Vutte evaṃ saussāho, balaṃ sajjiya rattiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12196_0: Saddhiṃ yo dhasahassehi, saṅgāmaṃ kāsi dussahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12198_0: Balaṃ taṃ ādipādassa, nipphoṭetvā tato tato;
anya-e0703n0:12204_0: Rājaputte duve ceva, rohaṇamhā tadā gate;
anya-e0703n0:12205_0: Jīvaggāhaṃ sagāhetvā, te ādāya puraṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:12207_0: Evaṃ pattajayo sūro, dīpe jāte nirākule;
anya-e0703n0:12210_0: Tepi gantvāna desaṃ taṃ, uttaraṃ desameva ca;
anya-e0703n0:12213_0: Rājāpi taṃ mahādeviṃ, bhariyaṃ kāsi attano;
anya-e0703n0:12219_0: Rañño sā’tipiyā āsi, tato paṭṭhāya sopi kho;
anya-e0703n0:12223_0: Vinā so’yanti amhākaṃ, ubho hutvāna ekato.
anya-e0703n0:12229_0: Rājā sabbaṃ nisamme’taṃ, maṇḍalīke tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12240_0: Atha rājā mahāseno, samugghātesi taṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12241_0: Dappuḷo so palāyittha, ādi pādā duve hatā.
anya-e0703n0:12252_0: Rājā so puttanattānaṃ, desaṃ kātuṃ nirākulaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12258_0: Ārocetvā pavattiṃ taṃ, tehi sammā pakāsito;
anya-e0703n0:12261_0: Dīpe sabbattha yojetvā, kattabbaṃ nagarepi ca;
anya-e0703n0:12265_0: Taṃ disvā rohaṇe sabbe, bhītā taṃ vasamāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12268_0: Hatthī asse ca maṇayo, gahetvā tassa hatthato.
anya-e0703n0:12303_0: Jiṇṇe devakūle katvā, bahuke tattha tattha so;
anya-e0703n0:12312_0: Anāthā ye salajjā ca, te ca saṅgaṇhi so raho;
anya-e0703n0:12319_0: Puññamevaṃ vidhaṃ tassa, appameyyaṃ bahuṃ kira.
anya-e0703n0:12321_0: Tassa putto tadā āsi, yuvarājā divaṅgato;
anya-e0703n0:12322_0: Jāto senāpati kāle, aparo atthi dārako.
anya-e0703n0:12324_0: Taṃ rājā rājaputtehi, bhīto rājāraho iti;
anya-e0703n0:12325_0: Māretuṃ taṃ na sakkonti, vaḍḍhapesi yathā tathā.
anya-e0703n0:12327_0: Arīhi nagare ruddhe, pitaraṃ so kirekadā;
anya-e0703n0:12333_0: Kāloyamīti mantvā so, bandhitvā churikaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n0:12337_0: Rājā disvā pasanno taṃ, senāpaccañca tassa’dā.
anya-e0703n0:12364_0: Accaye pituno rājā, uparājā ahosi so;
anya-e0703n0:12367_0: Senā nāmasi sappaññā, mahesī tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n0:12373_0: Datvā ṭhānantaraṃ rājā, tesaṃ tesaṃ yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12376_0: Atha kenāpi so gantvā, hetunā maṇihīrakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12377_0: Vasanto kira assosi, paccanto kupito iti.
anya-e0703n0:12380_0: Gantvā sādhetha taṃ desa-mīti pesesi sajjukaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12383_0: Vatvā yaṃkiñci bhindiṃsu, te ubhopi narādhipe.
anya-e0703n0:12385_0: Tato dve verino hutvā, desaṃ gaṇhitumārabhuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12388_0: Te ubho tattha ghātetvā, tesaṃ sabbaṃ samādiya;
anya-e0703n0:12389_0: Hantvā taṃ pakkhiye sabbe, puḷatthinagaraṃ gami.
anya-e0703n0:12395_0: Disvā rājāpi santuṭṭho, taṃ saṅgaṇhi yathārahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12397_0: Tena mettiṃ thiraṃ kātuṃ, dhītaraṃ deva nāmikaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12415_0: Pāsāde cetiyo ceva, vihāre ca anappake;
anya-e0703n0:12427_0: Pitarā ca mahādānaṃ, puññamaññampi vā kataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12428_0: Sabbaṃ tamavināsetvā, niccaṃ so rakkhi sādaro.
anya-e0703n0:12434_0: Bhikkhusaṅghassa sā gāmaṃ, mahummārañca tassa dā.
anya-e0703n0:12440_0: Datvā te me cayitvāna, vihārasseva dāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:12443_0: Nānārāge dhaje ceva, paṭākāyo ca pūjayi.
anya-e0703n0:12464_0: Puññanti vuttaṃ sabbaṃ so, na kiñci parivajjayi.
anya-e0703n0:12467_0: Bhojanaṃ bhojanatthīnaṃ, bahu so dāsi rattiyaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12472_0: Evaṃ puññāni katvāna, narindo so sapāriso;
anya-e0703n0:12475_0: Tato tassa suto āsi, sīhaḷānaṃ rathesato;
anya-e0703n0:12482_0: Sabbaṃ kāsi ahāpetvā, adhammaṃ tu vivajjayi.
anya-e0703n0:12488_0: Rajjaṃ katvāna catūsu, vassesu nidhanaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:12490_0: Aggabodhi tato rājā, chattaṃ ussāpayi pure;
anya-e0703n0:12497_0: Nāmaṃ gahetvā pituno, attano ca narādhipo.
anya-e0703n0:12508_0: Bhikkhū vā cetiye vā so, vanditvā nikkhamaṃ tato;
anya-e0703n0:12509_0: Vālukā hā vinassantu, iti pādesu vodhayī.
anya-e0703n0:12511_0: Yaṃ yaṃ sovaggiyaṃ kammaṃ, kammaṃ nissaraṇavahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12512_0: Vatthuttaye pasanno so, kammaṃ taṃ sabbamācari.
anya-e0703n0:12515_0: Gantvā tassā upaṭṭhānaṃ, pātova kira bhūpati.
anya-e0703n0:12523_0: Tassa toyena siñcitvā, sīsaṃ samakuṭaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12524_0: Gandhamālāhi taṃ sammā, cetiyaṃ viha pūjiya.
anya-e0703n0:12526_0: Namassitvāna tikkhattuṃ, katvā taṃ so padakkhiṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12544_0: Ṭhatvā adassane ṭhāne, tikkhattuṃ puna vandiya;
anya-e0703n0:12545_0: Santuṭṭho tena kammena, saranto taṃ punappunaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12554_0: Evaṃ puññaparo hutvā, katvā dīpassa saṅgahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12563_0: So te disvā pavattiṃ taṃ, sutvā datvā mahābalaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12565_0: Pāhesi pitarā yuddhaṃ, kātuṃ bandhu hite rate;
anya-e0703n0:12569_0: Te ubhopi palāyiṃsu, datvā senāya nāyakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12574_0: Yujjhanto maraṇaṃ gañchi, ñātisopi mato kira;
anya-e0703n0:12578_0: So dappuḷaṃ ṭhapetvāna, sevatthaṃ tassa rājino.
anya-e0703n0:12584_0: Rājākāsi dumindassa, gharaṃ jiṇṇaṃ navaṃ thiraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12586_0: Sovaṇṇakhacitaṃ kammaṃ, maṅgalena ca tassa so;
anya-e0703n0:12593_0: Vihāre jetanāme ca, katvā sovaṇṇayaṃ muniṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12611_0: Tasmiṃ rājini sampatte, devalokaṃ tadā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:12634_0: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ yāguṃ, sabbe gaṇhiṃsu sādarā;
anya-e0703n0:12638_0: Evamādiṃ sa katvāna, puññavaṃ vassehi tīhi ca.
anya-e0703n0:12641_0: Rājā dibbena yānena, gacchanto viya so mari.
anya-e0703n0:12653_0: Tato tassā’nujo seno, chattaṃ ussāpayī pure;
anya-e0703n0:12654_0: Piyaṃ’va puttaṃ passanto, satte sabbe mahādhano.
anya-e0703n0:12680_0: Rājā tasmiṃ akujjhitvā, sandhiṃ katvā akuppiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12683_0: Evaṃ samaggā te āsuṃ, tato paṭṭhāya khattiyā;
anya-e0703n0:12695_0: Vasantā damiḷā ettha, bahavo ye tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12696_0: Sabbe taṃ pakkhiyāhesuṃ, tato so balavā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:12710_0: Rājā senāya bhinnattaṃ, sukkā sabbaṃ samādiya;
anya-e0703n0:12716_0: Ekename na sakkā ve, sabbe etehi mārituṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12717_0: Etesaṃ na ca nīcānaṃ, hatthesu maraṇaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12719_0: Tasmā varaṃ me maraṇaṃ, mayā eveti cintiya;
anya-e0703n0:12722_0: Taṃ disvā bahavo sīse, tattha chindiṃsu sevakā;
anya-e0703n0:12723_0: Taṃ disvā damiḷī senā, haṭṭhatuṭṭhā pamodisā.
anya-e0703n0:12731_0: Supaṇṇo viya gaṇhanto, bhūjagena salilāla ye;
anya-e0703n0:12732_0: So taṃ sabbaṃ nivattesi, attānañca sugopayi.
anya-e0703n0:12737_0: Kiṃ me ekena verinaṃ, pūritena manorathaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12746_0: So taṃ disvā ca jhāpetvā, rājūnaṃ paṇḍudesinaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12756_0: Suvaṇṇa paṭimāyo ca, vihāresu tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12758_0: Sabbaṃ gahetvā nissāraṃ, laṅkādīpa makāsi so;
anya-e0703n0:12761_0: Rājā’pi rakkhaṃ datvāna, mahāmagge tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12765_0: Amacce tattha pesesi, disvā te sīhalādhipo.
anya-e0703n0:12767_0: Suṇitvā sāsanaṃ tesaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ sampaṭicchiya;
anya-e0703n0:12776_0: Nikkhamitvā purā gantvā, na cireneva paṭṭanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12777_0: Tattha āruyha nāvaṃ so, saka desa mupāgami.
anya-e0703n0:12782_0: Bhātaraṃ dutiyaṃ katvā, udayaṃ nāma khattiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12785_0: Sopi kho na cireneva, katvā puññaṃ yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12794_0: Yo senaṃ sabbapaṭhamo, seno nāma kumārako;
anya-e0703n0:12803_0: Tadā jeṭṭhasutaṃ tassa, mahindaṃ nāma khattiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12814_0: Tato kassapanāmaṃ so, tesaṃ jeṭṭhaṃ narissaro;
anya-e0703n0:12815_0: Desaṃ taṃ gaṇha yāhīti, datvā balamapesayi.
anya-e0703n0:12817_0: So’pi gantvāna taṃ hantvā, rohaṇaṃ kasiṇampi taṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12820_0: Atha so bhātaro dve’pi, senañca udayaṃ tathā;
anya-e0703n0:12823_0: Rājā tā sādhu vaḍḍhetvā, vayapattāsu tīsu so;
anya-e0703n0:12835_0: Evaṃ karonto ñātīnaṃ, saṃgahaṃ so yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12845_0: Ārāmike ca bahavo, dāse kammakarepi ca.
anya-e0703n0:12850_0: Vaḍḍhetvā tattha kāretvā, sabba sovaṇṇayaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12860_0: Saddhiṃ so saṅghanāmāya, deviyāpi ca attano.
anya-e0703n0:12893_0: Mahādevena so āsi, rammo dappula pabbato.
anya-e0703n0:12896_0: Ubhopi te vippakate, rājā so vasamāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:12907_0: Tato vīsati vassesu, pulatthi nagare vasaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12911_0: Pahāya dīpaṃ dīpo’va, mahāvāta hato gato.
anya-e0703n0:12923_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ mate tassa, kātabbaṃ sādhukāriya;
anya-e0703n0:12926_0: Āgamma nagaraṃ rājā, ahosi dharaṇī tale;
anya-e0703n0:12938_0: Bhariyā tassa yā āsi, saṅghātaṃ so bhisecayi;
anya-e0703n0:12941_0: Mahindaṃ nāma sappaññaṃ, kaṇiṭṭhaṃ bhātaraṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12947_0: Uppajjittha tadā putto, rañño saṅghāya deviyā;
anya-e0703n0:12962_0: Nikāyattaya vā sīhi, saddhiṃ bhikkhūhi āgato;
anya-e0703n0:12965_0: Yā tassa yuvarājassa, bhariyā tissā nāmikā;
anya-e0703n0:12968_0: Kittināmā’parāyā ca, bhariyā sāpi kho pana;
anya-e0703n0:12969_0: Vijāyi putte cattāro, tathā ekañca dhītaraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12971_0: Tadā rājāpi cintetvā, evaṃ sati kaṇiṭṭhako;
anya-e0703n0:12972_0: Nissaṅko mayi hotīti, sammā mantīhi mantiya.
anya-e0703n0:12990_0: Suññaṃ piṭṭhaṃ sayaṃ disvā, kasmā evanti saṃvadi.
anya-e0703n0:12996_0: Sabbaṃ sāragataṃ dīpe, samādāya gato iti.
anya-e0703n0:12998_0: Taṃ sutvā lajjito rājā, sayaṃ viya parājito;
anya-e0703n0:13004_0: Rājā disvā’ti santuṭṭho, kattabbaṃ tassa kāriya;
anya-e0703n0:13013_0: Ratanaṃ sabbamādāya, datvā rajjaṃ imassa ca;
anya-e0703n0:13029_0: Vegasā taṃ samāgamma, yuddhaṃ kātuṃ samārabhi.
anya-e0703n0:13031_0: Asampuṇṇa balattā so, viddho sallena bhūpati;
anya-e0703n0:13043_0: Sāraṃ sabbaṃsamādāya, dese ca nagare ṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13046_0: Paṇḍurāja kumāraṃ tu, tattha rajje’bhi siñciya;
anya-e0703n0:13050_0: Tattha tattha yathā kāmaṃ, vasanto akuto bhayo.
anya-e0703n0:13053_0: Kīḷanto viya nāvaṃ so, samāruyha visārado.
anya-e0703n0:13056_0: Taṃ sāsanaṃ nivedetvā, sāraṃ dassesi āhaṭaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13058_0: Rājā sādhūti vatvāna, kāretvā tassa saṅgahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13059_0: Saddhiṃ senāya āgantvā, pakaṭṭhāya sakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13064_0: Sabbaṃ pākatikaṃ kāsi, sāraṃ dīpe nirālayo;
anya-e0703n0:13073_0: Khinnā pubbassa rājassa, kāle dīpamhi pāṇino;
anya-e0703n0:13074_0: Nibbutā taṃ samāgamma, ghammā viya valāhakā.
anya-e0703n0:13082_0: Bodhigehaṃ karonto taṃ, disvā vaḍḍhakīno tadā;
anya-e0703n0:13086_0: So taṃ taṃ mupasaṃkamma, mahāpūjāya pūjiya.
anya-e0703n0:13091_0: Sākhā gacchaṃ tu uddhaṃva, kātuṃ sakkā yathāgharaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13106_0: Evaṃ khuddānu khuddāni, katvā puññāni so vibhū;
anya-e0703n0:13110_0: Tassa ṭhāne ṭhapetvāna, sabbaṃ tasseva tassadā.
anya-e0703n0:13131_0: Tuccho yaṃ neva hotūti, vāsaṃ saṅghassa taṃ akā.
anya-e0703n0:13133_0: Bhogagāme ca tassadā, rakkhake ca niyojayi;
anya-e0703n0:13154_0: Rāja taṃ bodhisattañca, sagharaṃ tattha sannahi;
anya-e0703n0:13173_0: Annaṃ pānañca vatthañca, tesaṃ datvā yathāruciṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13178_0: Tassa rañño mahesī ca, saṅghanāmā akārayi;
anya-e0703n0:13190_0: Tato tassā’nujo āsi, udayo nāma khattiyo;
anya-e0703n0:13193_0: Hutvā so sayaṃ rājā, kaṇiṭṭhaṃ sakabhātaraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13196_0: Rājā cintiya ñātīnaṃ, kātabbo saṅgaho iti;
anya-e0703n0:13208_0: Janaṃ hattagataṃ katvā, desaṃ sabbaṃ vināsiya;
anya-e0703n0:13212_0: Ānetuṃ tamupāyaṃ so, gavesanto tathā tathā.
anya-e0703n0:13215_0: Āmantesi mahāpuñña, sahāyo hoti me iti.
anya-e0703n0:13218_0: Putto tava mahindo so, vuddhippatto mahābalo.
anya-e0703n0:13226_0: Taṃ sutvā vacanaṃ rañño, kassapo bhāsi sādaro;
anya-e0703n0:13227_0: Deva devena vutto’haṃ, gaccheyyaṃ kintu me suto.
anya-e0703n0:13229_0: Vaṃso me pālito hoti, pasādo ca tavādhipa;
anya-e0703n0:13230_0: Tasmā kālamahāpetvā, yaṃ icchasi tathā kuru.
anya-e0703n0:13232_0: Sutvā atīvasantuṭṭho, narindo tassa taṃ vaco;
anya-e0703n0:13238_0: Tucchaṃ viya puraṃ katvā, sabbañca balavāhanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13248_0: Tato jānapadā sabbe, maṇḍalikā ca raṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0703n0:13251_0: Gantvā taṃ parivāresuṃ, laddho no sāmiko iti.
anya-e0703n0:13253_0: Patanto sopi kho coro, ṭhitova girimaṇḍale;
anya-e0703n0:13257_0: Mahindasenā ghātentī, tassa senaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13260_0: Disvā malayapādamhi, gahetvā ettha so iti.
anya-e0703n0:13271_0: Tamādāya’ti tuṭṭho so, jano āgamma sajjukaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13289_0: Duṭṭhe ca paṭibāhetvā, maṇḍalīke ca raṭṭhiye.
anya-e0703n0:13303_0: Rājāpi disvā taṃ kuddho, khippaṃ pakkhippa cārake;
anya-e0703n0:13306_0: Adāsi ca tulābhāraṃ, tikkhattuṃ so mahāyaso;
anya-e0703n0:13340_0: Tato rajje patiṭṭhāya, kassapo dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13347_0: Dānaṃ daṇḍissaraṃ nāma, sadā dāpesi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n0:13354_0: Taṃ sutvā kupito rājā, balaṃ pesesi attano;
anya-e0703n0:13355_0: Yujjhitvā taṃ parājesi, mahindo so mahābhaṭo.
anya-e0703n0:13357_0: Tato rājā nivattetuṃ, pitaraṃ tassa pesayi;
anya-e0703n0:13358_0: Kassapaṃ yuvarājaṃ taṃ, so gantvā puttasantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13363_0: Ādipādo tu so pacchā, ghātetvā maṇḍalādhipe;
anya-e0703n0:13367_0: Datvā so dhītaraṃ tassā, pesesi puna rohaṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13370_0: Gāhāpesi nave bhikkhū, āvāse tattha tattha so.
anya-e0703n0:13375_0: Akāsi ca nikāyesu, tīsu bimbe silāmaye;
anya-e0703n0:13384_0: Thale jale ca sattānaṃ, adāsi abhayaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n0:13397_0: Ekamekaṃ kuṭiṃ katvā, dāpesi ca camūpati.
anya-e0703n0:13399_0: Rattamālagirismiṃ so, katvā rammaṃ taraṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13420_0: Bhesajjagehaṃ kāresi, nagare tattha tattha so;
anya-e0703n0:13436_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ so adā sādhu, ṭhapetvā vattamuttamaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13448_0: Yathā kammaṃ gato ṭhatvā, vassāni dasasatta ca.
anya-e0703n0:13454_0: Vattā so maramantiva, cāgavā dhanado viya.
anya-e0703n0:13465_0: Bhūmicando narindo so, vaṃse jātassa attano;
anya-e0703n0:13471_0: So dhetvā sāsanaṃ sabbaṃ, dhammakammena satthuno;
anya-e0703n0:13511_0: Nagare vajjasālā ca, tesaṃ gāme ca dāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:13538_0: Akāsi pāḷikaṃ nāma, pāsādaṃ sumano haraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13543_0: Tassā puttosi siddhattho, nāma issariye ṭhito;
anya-e0703n0:13546_0: Rājā tasmiṃ mate katvā, sālaṃ bhikkhunamuttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13549_0: Evaṃ dhammena kārente, rajjaṃ laṅkādīpe tadā;
anya-e0703n0:13577_0: Vaḍḍhesi tena taṃ puttaṃ, katvā senāya nāyakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13582_0: Sāsanassa ca lokassa, santiṃ katvā anekadhā;
anya-e0703n0:13583_0: Rājā so dasame vasse, sukhena tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:13586_0: Vattāvādī kavī so satidhītivisado desako bhāvako ca;
anya-e0703n0:13588_0: Rājindo kassapo’yaṃ viya vimalaguṇo hotulokopi sabbo.
anya-e0703n0:13602_0: Rājā so sattame māse, paviṭṭho paccuno mukhaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13611_0: Mahābhogaṃ adā tassa, nivāsesi purā bahi.
anya-e0703n0:13625_0: Āvāsaṃ rakkhako nāma, tassa senāpatī akā;
anya-e0703n0:13628_0: Kataṃ taṃ pubbarājehi, rājā so paripāliya;
anya-e0703n0:13640_0: Tadā jānapadā ceva, nāgarā ca balāni ca;
anya-e0703n0:13649_0: Taṃ sutvā yuvarājā ca, ādipādo ca taṃ sakhā;
anya-e0703n0:13656_0: Yatīnaṃ purato tesaṃ, nipajjitvā urena te.
anya-e0703n0:13671_0: Ādāya te vanaṃ tesaṃ, netvā rājagharaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:13676_0: Laṃkābhisekaṃ patvāna, seno so matimā tato;
anya-e0703n0:13677_0: Udayaṃ ādipādaṃ taṃ, yuvarājaṃ akā sakhaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13701_0: Pariveṇaṃ nāgasālaṃ, disvā gāma madā tadā.
anya-e0703n0:13704_0: Maṇḍapāni ca rammāni, dhātupūjaṃ akā sadā.
anya-e0703n0:13712_0: Niddālu majjapo āsi, rājā pāpena jantunaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13718_0: Tāni nādāsi so rājā, tena coḷo mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n0:13721_0: Tadā senāpati ettha, paccante kupite gato;
anya-e0703n0:13724_0: Hato senāpati tattha, yujjhi na raṇe mato;
anya-e0703n0:13725_0: Kakūṭādīni ādāya, rājā so rohaṇaṃ agā.
anya-e0703n0:13728_0: Nivattitvā sakaṃ raṭṭhaṃ, agamāsi idhatā bhayā.
anya-e0703n0:13749_0: Bhutvā niggahasaṅgahehi sakalaṃ lokaṃ vase vattiya;
anya-e0703n0:13751_0: Iccevaṃ satataṃ sarantu sujanā hātuṃ pamādaṃ madaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13758_0: Tato laṅkābhisekaṃ so, patvā seno kamāgataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13762_0: Yutto dayāya mettāya, rājā so sabbadā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:13765_0: Raṭṭhe tasmiṃ vasantā’suṃ, sukhitā nibbhayā sadā.
anya-e0703n0:13786_0: Tassā puttā duve jātā, dhītā ekā manoramā.
anya-e0703n0:13792_0: Pesesi nāgadīpaṃ so, sutvā taṃ bhūpati idha.
anya-e0703n0:13798_0: Yujjhitvā taṃ vināsetvā, gaṇhi so yuddhamaṇḍale.
anya-e0703n0:13800_0: Asakkento imaṃ jetuṃ, rājā naṃ vallabhādayo;
anya-e0703n0:13806_0: Saddhammaṃ kathāyantānaṃ, katvā sammā na muttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13807_0: Dhammaṃ sutvāna so rājā, pasanno buddhasāsane.
anya-e0703n0:13813_0: Dāpesi vipulaṃ suddhaṃ, sadā ekadine viya.
anya-e0703n0:13816_0: Pesesi bhojanaṃ suddhaṃ, mahagghaṃ vipulaṃ sadā.
anya-e0703n0:13860_0: Kathāpesi ca bhikkhūhi, byattehi vinayaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n0:13872_0: Tassa vatthāni bhājetvā, bhikkhūnaṃ dāpayī sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13874_0: Sadā so attano rajje, uyyānesu tahiṃtahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13890_0: Catunnaṃ cetiyānaṃ so, ramanīyaṃ gharaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n0:13910_0: Sā tasmiṃ pariveṇe ca, akā kappāsagāmake;
anya-e0703n0:13926_0: Katvā soḷasame vasse, rājā so tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:13928_0: Jāto paṭicca taṃ rājaṃ, senā dvādasavassiko;
anya-e0703n0:13932_0: Pitu senāpati seno, tassa senāpati ahu.
anya-e0703n0:13935_0: Mātarā saha vattantaṃ, kaṇiṭṭhaṃ tassa bhātaraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13940_0: Taṃ sutvā kupito hutvā, seno senāpati tadā;
anya-e0703n0:13944_0: Rakkhāmi taṃ amaccanti, gato nikkhamma rohaṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13952_0: Yujjhituṃ tena so rājā, balaṃ pesesi rohaṇā;
anya-e0703n0:13953_0: Senāpati vināsesi, sabbaṃ taṃ rājino balaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13955_0: Damiḷā te janapadaṃ, pīḷetvā rakkhasā viya;
anya-e0703n0:13959_0: Nivedesuṃ pavattiṃ taṃ, mantetvā sacīvehi so.
anya-e0703n0:13967_0: Vasante tattha laṃkinde, ahitā vallabhā janā;
anya-e0703n0:13970_0: Majjapāne guṇaṃ vatvā, pāyesuṃ taṃ mahīpatiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13971_0: Pivitvā majjapānaṃ so, mattabyāḷo ahu tadā.
anya-e0703n0:13973_0: Āhārānaṃ khayaṃ patvā, cajitvā dullabhaṃ padaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13974_0: Mato so dasame vasse, taruṇoyeva bhūpati.
anya-e0703n0:13985_0: Mahindo taṃ kaṇiṭṭho so, rājaputto tadaccaye;
anya-e0703n0:13994_0: Accantaṃ khīṇacitto so, vassamhi dasame vibhū;
anya-e0703n0:13997_0: Aladdha vuttino sabbe, keraḷā sahitā tato;
anya-e0703n0:13998_0: Na vuttidānaṃ no yāva, hoti mātāva bhuñjatu.
anya-e0703n0:14007_0: Bhātu jāyamma hesitte, ṭhapetvā so tahiṃ vasī.
anya-e0703n0:14018_0: Tato sesesu ṭhānesu, keraḷā sīhaḷā tadā;
anya-e0703n0:14025_0: Balaṃ mahantaṃ balavā, taṃ khippaṃ laṃkamotari.
anya-e0703n0:14030_0: Chattiṃse rājino vasse, mahesiṃ ratanāni ca;
anya-e0703n0:14039_0: Mahīpālaṃ dhanaṃ tañca, sabbaṃ hatthagataṃ tato;
anya-e0703n0:14045_0: Bhinditvā sahasā sabbe, vihāre ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14058_0: Sabbaṃ te rohaṇaṃ desaṃ, saṅkhobhesu mito tato.
anya-e0703n0:14067_0: Katvā chamāsaṃ saṅgāmaṃ, haniṃsu damiḷe bahūṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14072_0: Kumāro jayito disvā, ubho te sacive tadā;
anya-e0703n0:14075_0: Buddho paveṇigāmaṃ so, varaṃ yācittha kittiko;
anya-e0703n0:14076_0: Saṅghikaṃ gahitaṃ bhāgaṃ, vissajjetuṃ varaṃ vari.
anya-e0703n0:14079_0: Niddarā sādarā vīrā, pāde vandiṃsu tassa te.
anya-e0703n0:14097_0: So rājā damiḷe hantuṃ, dhanaṃ sañciya’nekādhā;
anya-e0703n0:14103_0: Na yāva rājaraṭṭhassa, gahaṇaṃ hoti tāva me;
anya-e0703n0:14109_0: Yujjhituṃ samayo neti, dvādase vacchare lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14119_0: Sahatthena sakaṃ sīsaṃ, chinditvā sahasā mari.
anya-e0703n0:14124_0: Bhayā saraṭṭhaṃ hitvā’tha, duṭṭhadese vasaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n0:14134_0: Tato cattāri vassāni, rajjaṃ kāresi rohaṇe.
anya-e0703n0:14136_0: Tampi coḷāraṇe hantvā, mahesiṃ dhītarā saha;
anya-e0703n0:14140_0: Akā vassadvayaṃ coḷā, ghātesuṃ tampi yujjhiya.
anya-e0703n0:14176_0: Tato bhāviniṃ siddhi, mapekkhaṃ nayanaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14180_0: Varaṃ padāya nabhasā, rājamāno gato tato.
anya-e0703n0:14192_0: Pāletu iti so rajjaṃ, sampattaṃ sampaṭikkhipi.
anya-e0703n0:14210_0: Katvā taṃ pariveṇassa, sāmikaṃ dharaṇī pati.
anya-e0703n0:14213_0: Parihāre adā tassa, pessavagge ca pañca so.
anya-e0703n0:14219_0: Rājā ca lokaṃ pālesi, sammā tassānusiṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0703n0:14231_0: Devalā lokikā cāti, nāmato vissutā subhā.
anya-e0703n0:14236_0: Sā moggallāna lokavhe, putte dve labhi sobhane;
anya-e0703n0:14246_0: Guṇaṃ sabbattha vaṇṇesuṃ, tasmiṃ devā pasīdiya.
anya-e0703n0:14248_0: Guṇaṃ suṇitvā laṃkindo, tadā sabbattha patthaṭaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14260_0: Yato bhikkhū samūhetvā, vāsaṃ kappesi yattha so;
anya-e0703n0:14275_0: Sā taṃ paṭicca kittiñca, mittaṃ nāma kumārikaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14276_0: Mahindaṃ rakkhitaṃ cāpi, latittha caturo pajā.
anya-e0703n0:14288_0: Kittādike jane neke, vase vattiya sabbathā.
anya-e0703n0:14294_0: Saṅgho nāma kumārassa, sarūpaṃ sādhuvaṃ bravi.
anya-e0703n0:14302_0: Tassa so vacanaṃ sutvā, sevitabbo kumārako;
anya-e0703n0:14305_0: Suṇitvā so vaco tesaṃ, nivattanabhayā vibhū;
anya-e0703n0:14311_0: Tahiṃ so nivasaṃ vīro, pesayitvā sasevake;
anya-e0703n0:14314_0: Tato’bhimānī senānī, senaṃ so tattha pesayi;
anya-e0703n0:14323_0: Tadāpi senaṃ senindo, pesetvā asakiṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14341_0: Lokanāmo camūnātho, lokaṃ hitvā sakaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n0:14350_0: Kesādhātu tato yuddhe, bhinditvā damiḷaṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14359_0: Pavattiṃ taṃ suṇitvā so, sābhimāno bhusaṃtato;
anya-e0703n0:14366_0: Dukkaraṃ ettha yuddhanti, gato so khadiraṅgaṇiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14394_0: Caturo caturopāye, yo jayaṃ tattha so vasī.
anya-e0703n0:14418_0: Upaggamma janā sabbe, karaṃ no denti sabbaso.
anya-e0703n0:14424_0: Senaṃ mahantiṃ datvāna, pesesi sacivaṃ nijaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14444_0: Rañño bhaṭā vināsetvā, sabbaṃ taṃ damiḷaṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14450_0: Tahiṃ taṃ sakalaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, netvā rañño padassiya;
anya-e0703n0:14453_0: Mahīpālopi taṃ sutvā, sacivānaṃ vaco tadā;
anya-e0703n0:14462_0: Taṃ vijāniya bhūmindo, senindaṃ pesayī sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14468_0: Patiṃsu tasmiṃ saṅgāme, bhūpālassa narā bahū;
anya-e0703n0:14489_0: Atho laṃkissaro tattha, khippaṃ gantvā mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n0:14493_0: Ṭhānā kubulagallā ca, yujjhanto taṃ palāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:14498_0: Tadā narissaro tata, tassa sabbaṃ samādiya;
anya-e0703n0:14504_0: Tato rājā samavhāya, sacīve dve mahabbale;
anya-e0703n0:14505_0: Pesesi dikkhiṇaṃ passaṃ, vasaṃ netuṃ tahiṃ jane.
anya-e0703n0:14526_0: Vikkamāti sayaṃ sutvā, kālaññū so mahīpahi.
anya-e0703n0:14537_0: Tattha tattha ṭhitā sūrā, coḷā ye kakkhalā’khilā;
anya-e0703n0:14540_0: Nikkhamma nagarā gantvā, coḷā bahi mahāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14541_0: Katvā parājitā bhītā, pavissa nagaraṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14559_0: Sīhaḷā balavantoti, bhiyyo senaṃ na pāhiṇi.
anya-e0703n0:14587_0: Pulatthinagaraṃ gañchi, vase vattiya taṃ balaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14602_0: Datvāna dakkhiṇaṃ desaṃ, taṃ saṅgaṇhi yathāvidhiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14608_0: Datvā rajje yathāñāyaṃ, karaṃ yojesi gaṇhituṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14617_0: Tatheva seṭṭhinātho ca, iccete bhātaro tayo.
anya-e0703n0:14622_0: Te sabbe rohaṇaṃ raṭṭhaṃ, sabbaṃ malayamaṇḍalaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14626_0: Nighātento bahū tattha, tattha paccatthike jane.
anya-e0703n0:14629_0: Dakkhiṇo dakkhiṇaṃ desaṃ, sayaṃ gantvā mahabbalo.
anya-e0703n0:14643_0: Sutvā vaṃsakkamaṃ tassā, so ñatvā suddhavaṃsataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14646_0: Sā taṃ paṭicca rājānaṃ, mahesī dhītaraṃ labhi;
anya-e0703n0:14650_0: Vīravammassa pādāsi, sā labhi dhītaro duve.
anya-e0703n0:14652_0: Samānanāmikā jeṭṭhā, sā mātā mahiyā ahu;
anya-e0703n0:14653_0: Sugalā nāmikā āsi, tāsu dvīsu kaṇiṭṭhikā.
anya-e0703n0:14661_0: Subhaddā ca sumittā ca, lokanāthavhayāpi ca;
anya-e0703n0:14665_0: Sampattā sā pajavuddhiṃ, haranti rājino mataṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14668_0: Gabbho jātumahīpālaṃ, taṃ paṭicca na saṇṭhahi.
anya-e0703n0:14680_0: Bhūte ca bhāvino ceva, sabbe bhūpe’tisāyino.
anya-e0703n0:14710_0: Tesaṃ pādāsi paccekaṃ, vuttiṃ so anurūpakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14719_0: Saha bhogena pādāsi, tadā bandhu hiterato.
anya-e0703n0:14731_0: Vicinitvā kulīne so, jane sabbe samādiya;
anya-e0703n0:14809_0: Attano visayaṃ patte, coḷo sīhaḷa dūtake;
anya-e0703n0:14816_0: Avhāya damiḷe dūte, iti coḷassa sandisi.
anya-e0703n0:14818_0: Senaṃ vinā’va ekasmiṃ, dīpe majjhe mahaṇṇave;
anya-e0703n0:14821_0: Balaṃ sannayha sakalaṃ, rajje tuyhaṃ mamā’tha vā;
anya-e0703n0:14825_0: Iti vatvāna te dūte, itthalaṅkāra maṇḍite.
anya-e0703n0:14842_0: Puttehi tīhi sahitaṃ, rājino ca kaṇīyasiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14845_0: Rājā nikkhamma khippaṃ so, gantvā dakkhiṇapassakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14881_0: Etā caññā ca so chinna-mariyādā vāpiyo bahū;
anya-e0703n0:14915_0: Paṭisaṅkharijiṇṇe so, gāme cā’dā visuṃ visuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14924_0: Gāme datvāna paccekaṃ, sālāyo cāpi kārayi.
anya-e0703n0:14926_0: Anāgate taṃ bhūpālā, mā gaṇhantū’ti lekhiya;
anya-e0703n0:14933_0: Bandhūnampi ca so tesaṃ, bhogagāme padāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:14944_0: Padinnā pubbarājūhi, ye gāmā rohaṇe bahū;
anya-e0703n0:14945_0: Tepi sabbe anūne so, yathāpubbaṃ ṭhapesi ca.
anya-e0703n0:14948_0: Bhattaṃ cā’dāsi so kāka soṇādīnaṃ dayāparo.
anya-e0703n0:14956_0: Andhānaṃ paṅgulānañca, gāme cā’dā visuṃ visuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14980_0: Tadā neke ca sacivā, tasso rodhajanāpi ca;
anya-e0703n0:14990_0: Gajabāhū’ti vidite, tassa jāte sute tato.
anya-e0703n0:14993_0: Rohaṇaṃ kasiṇaṃ datvā, tahiṃ vāsāya pesayi.
anya-e0703n0:14995_0: Tato so tattha gantvāna, mahānāgahulaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15001_0: Saggaṃ lokaṃ sapuññappabhavamuruphalaṃ passituṃ cā’ru roha.
anya-e0703n0:15008_0: Tadārañño nujāmittā, tassa puttā tayo’pi ca;
anya-e0703n0:15033_0: Tā tassāḷāhanaṭṭhāna dassane neva so ahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15035_0: Sokabhāraṃ vinodessaṃ, mama ceto gataṃ iti;
anya-e0703n0:15047_0: Tayo te bhātaro tattha, sampattāva jayā tato;
anya-e0703n0:15051_0: Saṅgāmesuṃ parājesi, bhiyyo yujjhittha so tayo.
anya-e0703n0:15086_0: Mātā ca tiṇṇaṃ bhātūnaṃ, jayabāhu ca bhūmipo;
anya-e0703n0:15101_0: Sutvā tamatthaṃ dūtehi, so vikkamabhujopi ca;
anya-e0703n0:15107_0: Ripavo dāni me sabbe, ummūlessāmahaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n0:15111_0: Khippaṃ pāvekkhi kalyāṇiṃ, so’pi te gahaṇatthiko.
anya-e0703n0:15119_0: So vikkamabhujo sutvā, pavattiṃ bhūbhujo tadā;
anya-e0703n0:15134_0: Palāyamāno so bhīto, āgantvāna nijaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15141_0: Pesayitvā sakaṃ sopi, mahantaṃ sakalaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15150_0: Āvasiṃsu yathāpubbaṃ, gantvā raṭṭhaṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15177_0: Paṭimāyo ca acchijja, yathākāmaṃ vayaṃ nayī.
anya-e0703n0:15198_0: Aggiṃ dentā taḷāke ca, chindantā jalapūrite.
anya-e0703n0:15201_0: Chindantā nāḷikerādi, so pakāre ca bhūruhe.
anya-e0703n0:15222_0: Iti vattabba taṃyeva, yātaṃ laṅkātalaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n0:15224_0: Evaṃ gāmakabhojakā viya bhusaṃtejo vihīnā sadā;
anya-e0703n0:15236_0: Mittāvhā rājinī ceva, tadā kālamakaṃsu te.
anya-e0703n0:15257_0: Na dissate pātubhāvo, aho no appapuññatā.
anya-e0703n0:15317_0: Nemittake ca pucchiṃsu, sunitvā te pamoditā.
anya-e0703n0:15322_0: Taṃ suṇitvā amaccā ca, tathā nagaravāsino;
anya-e0703n0:15334_0: Suvinaṭṭhe vihāre ca, dhātugabbhe ca vāpiyo;
anya-e0703n0:15338_0: Na ciraṃ saṇṭhahi gabbha-varo kucchimhi deviyā.
anya-e0703n0:15346_0: Suppasannā asesā ca, disāyo taṃkhaṇe ahu;
anya-e0703n0:15382_0: Te santappiya bhogehi, bhiyyo pucchittha sādaraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15403_0: Hāni yākācisatataṃ, yathā tassa na hessati;
anya-e0703n0:15407_0: Sabbathā na samatthoyaṃ, putto gajabāhu mama.
anya-e0703n0:15410_0: Nihīno mātugottena, na rajjassa raho mama.
anya-e0703n0:15415_0: Itipesesi dūte so, ānetuṃ taṃ kumārakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15419_0: Tassetaṃ vacanaṃ yuttaṃ, vuttaṃ mehita buddhiyā.
anya-e0703n0:15424_0: Kiñca tattha kumāramhi, nīte vikkama bāhuno;
anya-e0703n0:15430_0: Iti hatthe gatānaṃ so, dūtānaṃ thanayaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15443_0: Sutvā dve bhātaro aññe, jeṭṭhasso paratiṃsadā;
anya-e0703n0:15444_0: Khippaṃ saraṭṭhā āgamma, kāresuṃ antimaṃ vidhiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15449_0: Datvā raṭṭhadvayaṃ aññaṃ, vatthuṃ tattheva ādisi;
anya-e0703n0:15453_0: Dhītaro dve ca gantāna, mahā nāmahulaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15468_0: Mayhaṃ eso nirālambo, putto hehīti sabbathā.
anya-e0703n0:15470_0: Tasmā me sunūno esā, dātuṃ yuttā kumārikā;
anya-e0703n0:15485_0: Tuyhaṃ jātoti amhākaṃ, sambandho so kathaṃ siyā;
anya-e0703n0:15488_0: Evaṃ so deviyā tāya, nekaso vārayantiyā;
anya-e0703n0:15504_0: Mūlarajjādhipaccaṃ taṃ, ammaṃ nindākaraṃ na hi.
anya-e0703n0:15510_0: Pasayha tāva taṃ rajjaṃ, vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:15512_0: Velakkāra balaṃ sabbaṃ, bhindiṃsu dhana dānato;
anya-e0703n0:15516_0: Ubhinnaṃ rājūnaṃ dūte, pesayuṃ nekaso tato.
anya-e0703n0:15518_0: Rajjaṃ sādhetvā dassāma, ekībhūtā mayaṃ pana;
anya-e0703n0:15521_0: Tato dve bhātukā senaṃ, sakaṃ sannayha vegasā;
anya-e0703n0:15524_0: Pahiṇiṃsu ca te dūte, tato gajabohuvhayo;
anya-e0703n0:15528_0: Rājāno dve ca no raṭṭhaṃ, saṅgāmatthamupāgatā.
anya-e0703n0:15530_0: Paṭhamaṃ tesu pakkhassa, ekassa balino bhusaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15531_0: Mukhabhaṅge kate khippaṃ, tato aññe susādhiyā.
anya-e0703n0:15540_0: Tatova so nivattitvā, sakaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gato lahuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15551_0: Raṭṭhe sake sakeyeva, tato pabhūti bhūmipā;
anya-e0703n0:15564_0: Paccante īdise dese, kathaṃ nāma vasissare.
anya-e0703n0:15590_0: Janassa balato tassa, passato locanehi so;
anya-e0703n0:15594_0: Bherini dena pūrento, disā dasa samantato.
anya-e0703n0:15625_0: Piyena viya mittena, tena saddhiṃ mahīpati.
anya-e0703n0:15636_0: Gāmaṃ taṃ sādhukaṃ sajju, sajjāpetvā saputtakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15639_0: Pitā putto ubho tassa, sambhāsiya piyaṃ vaco;
anya-e0703n0:15673_0: Puttena saha so saṅkha-tthali nāmaṃ puraṃ gami.
anya-e0703n0:15681_0: Suṇitvā tañca so amhaṃ, vaṃso jāto mahā”iti;
anya-e0703n0:15694_0: Khippaṃ kāretukāmo so, sayaṃ iti vicintayi.
anya-e0703n0:15696_0: Kesa akkhaka gīvaṭṭhi-dāṭhā pattāna meva ca;
anya-e0703n0:15705_0: Tayo me pitaro bhūpā, mātulopi ca sabbathā;
anya-e0703n0:15714_0: Tesu kittisiri meghaṃ, petteyyaṃ me ṭhapetva te;
anya-e0703n0:15721_0: Na heva asmiṃ lokasmiṃ, saṃvijjati kadācipi.
anya-e0703n0:15748_0: Caritātisayaṃ kattuṃ, samatthā honti ye bhuvi.
anya-e0703n0:15751_0: Yadihaṃ na karissāmi, moghā me jāti hessati.
anya-e0703n0:15754_0: Mayā te adhikā kintu, paññādīhīti cintiya.
anya-e0703n0:15760_0: Yathicchitañce na bhave, mahatī jāni me bhusaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15766_0: Adhippāyānurūpaṃ me, samatthā vā na vācarā.
anya-e0703n0:15768_0: Ye keci’dha janā santi, sabbe te mama sammukhā;
anya-e0703n0:15774_0: Sādhetuṃ dukkaraṃ raṭṭhaṃ, bhavate kākinā kathaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15784_0: Sabbametaṃ vaco jātu, saddhātabbaṃ siyā na hi.
anya-e0703n0:15809_0: Taṃ khaṇaṃ purato ko’pi, saṅkhasaddo samuggato.
anya-e0703n0:15811_0: Tato nekanimittaññū, kumāro taṃ suṇi tva so;
anya-e0703n0:15826_0: Tahiṃ ṭhite so passitvā, ettakā kinnu āgatā;
anya-e0703n0:15827_0: Iti pucchi kumārotha, tepi taṃ ida mabravuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15830_0: Kimeva muccate maccu-bhayaṃ kesaṃ na vijjati.
anya-e0703n0:15833_0: Ajjāpi hi mukhe tuyhaṃ, khīragandho pavāyati.
anya-e0703n0:15835_0: Na hevatthi visuṃ vitta-jātaṃ saṅgahitaṃ tava;
anya-e0703n0:15842_0: Kāressati idaṃ nāma, sabbathā neva ñāyate.
anya-e0703n0:15853_0: Nisamma tesaṃ vacanaṃ, vidhāya madhuraṃ sitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15857_0: Na jāniṃsu mamaṃ sabbe, yesañhi bhayamidisaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15859_0: Iti vatvā bhayaṃ tesaṃ, vinodetu mupaṭṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15865_0: Bāloti maṃ cintaya taṃ, jātā vo kumatīdisī;
anya-e0703n0:15866_0: Parikkhīyati te jāṇā, navayo’ti na kiṃ sutaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15871_0: Karissanti yathā vedaṃ, bhayaṃ tumhe jahissatha;
anya-e0703n0:15875_0: Anudhāvati maṃ tāta, setehi yadi vo bhayaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15877_0: Purato hotha tumhehi, vatvā te gahitāyudho;
anya-e0703n0:15881_0: Aparaṃ ravi bimbaṃva, pacchimā sā mukhoditaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15904_0: Yathā na sahitā honti, ṭhapetabbā visuṃ visuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15907_0: Tathā senāpati katvā, vañcetuṃ taṃ mahāmatiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15908_0: Dassetvā’ti thīsakkāraṃ, rañño dūte sa pesayi.
anya-e0703n0:15910_0: Kumāro’tha viditvāna, tena taṃ vañcanaṃ kataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15913_0: Icchitatthassa nipphatti, na me jātu bhavissati;
anya-e0703n0:15920_0: Māraṇaṃ sāmino mayhaṃ, kiṃ nimittamīti bravi.
anya-e0703n0:15925_0: Kumārassa mukhaṃ disvā, vedhamāno bhayena so;
anya-e0703n0:15931_0: Niyogaṃ me vinā tena, kataṃ kammaṃ na yujjati;
